José tiene su propio negocio, en donde tiene diez años recorriendo la capital al dar su servicio como taxista, siendo de su propiedad, lo que ayudado en su economía. Su esposa es comerciantes y ambos cuidan de sus cuatro hijos todos estudiantes.
Don José ha mejorado su casa, a través de los préstamos, que gracias al plazo logra equilibrar sus gastos. Lo que ha logrado dar  a su familia seguridad y bienestar. Con este financiamiento será para la compra de puerta de madera, ya que solo verja tiene a si como la ventana. Terminando una obra más gracias al apoyo de la institución.
texts.en:
Jose has his own business.  He spent ten years gathering the funds to be a taxi driver, and  having his own cab has helped him with his finances.   His wife is a merchant and they both take care of their four school-aged children.

Jose has improved his house with the loans that have helped him stabilize his expenses.  He has succeeded in giving his family security and well-being.   He will use this loan to buy a wooden door since now he only has an iron gate like that which is on his window.  This will finish another part of the house thanks to the support of the institution.

loans.use: To buy a door and a window for his house.

loans.name: Albina

texts.es: Una mujer D. amplia trayectoria es Albina, D. 63 años, que disfruta D. la compañía D. su esposo en su casa propia. DesD. hace 50 años se dedica a los bordados D. trajes típicos D. su región, su amplia experiencia en el arte es gracias a la enseñanza D. su madre, del mismo modo también le enseño a cultivar la tierra y el cuidado D. los animales. Es así que día a día trabaja sola en su misma casa, pero hay momentos que necesita contratar la mano D. obra D. personas que la ayudan en  su producción, ya que su taller D. bordaduría es conocida por su zona y tiene prestigio y eso la favorece para tener siempre clientela fija. Considera que su trabajo es rentable ya que sus clientes están dispuestos a pagar el precio, porque lo consideran justo por la calidad y acabado que entrega. Adicionalmente a esto también se dedica a la agricultura y cada 6 meses regresa a sus campos para cosechar. Manifiesta que siempre estará dedicada a su trabajo, es por esta razón que se ha propuesto aumentar la producción D. tejidos, pues tiene más pedidos D. bordados y desea cumplirlos a tiempo. Es su tercer crédito con MFP y bajo la modalidad D. créditos grupales a través D. su banco comunal, le agrada reunirse con su grupo y compartir experiencias, por tanto considera que es equipo sólido que trabaja con unidad. Con ese mismo empeño ha decidido que el crédito lo invertirá en la compra D. más materiales para sus bordados como hilos D. diversos colores y tela.
texts.en: Albina is a woman with a significant background in her activity. She is 63 years old and lives happily with her husband in her own house. For more than 50 years she has been engaging in embroidery, trimming the typical dresses of her region: she owes the wiD. experience she has in this art to her mother, who also taught her how to till the land and to breed animals. Thus she works alone day by day in her own house, but there are times when she needs to pay for workhands to help her in her production: her embroidery workshop is renowned and considered prestigious in her area, something that favors her by granting her recurring customers. She thinks her job is profitable because her customers are willing to pay what she asks, considering it to be fair seeing the quality and finish she offers. On top of this she also engages in agriculture, and every 6 months she returns to her lands to harvest. She says she will always engage in her job, and for this reason she has put her mind to increasing the knitting production, as she has more embroidery requests and wants to satisfy them on time. This is her thirds loan with MFP through the group loans of her communal bank. She likes meeting up with her group and share experiences, and for this reason she believes her team to be sound and to be working in unity. Showing the same determination, she has decided she will invest the loan in the purchase of more materials for her embroidery, such as fabric and threads in different colors.

loans.use: To buy fabric and threads in different colors.

loans.name: Servio

texts.es: Servio se dedica a una pulpería ubicada en su casa de habitación. Pues siempre está buscando la forma de generar ingresos para su familia. Realiza sus compras de contado en el mercado y a camiones repartidores, ya que los precios son más baratos y le generan más ingresos, sus ventas las efectúa de contado y al crédito. Esta solicitando un nuevo financiamiento para invertirlo en su negocio, para la compra de golosinas, refrescos, granos básicos y jugos el cual está generando ingresos favorables.
texts.en: Servio has a grocery store in his home.  He is always seeking ways to generate income for his family.  He makes his purchases on a cash basis at the market and from delivery trucks, since the prices there are lower and so his profits will be higher.  He sells his products on a cash and credit basis.  He is requesting a new loan to invest in his business.  He will use the loan to buy candies, soft drinks, staple grains and juices, which will allow him to generate more income.

loans.use: to buy candies, soft drinks, staple grains and juices

loans.name: Narcisa Paulina

texts.es:
En la parroquia Andrés De Vera  de la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal Rosa De Guadalupe.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Narcisa, tiene 27 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de 8 y de 1 año, el mayor  estudian en escuela. El marido es controlador de autobús.
 
Es una muy buena ama de casa que siempre le gusta pensar en  su futuro y más en el futuro de sus hijos. Ella y su esposo quieren aprovechar que su papá tiene una finca la cual está desocupada,  ellos quieren ocupar este terreno que tiene mucho pasto para comenzar con la cría de vacas, con este crédito  piensan comprar una vaca parida para aprovechar la leche la cual les serviría para la venta y para su consumo y así ahorrar el gasto diario que ocasiona la compra de este alimento.

Lleva dos ciclos en el banco y le gusta porque los créditos le sirven para poder llevar a cabo sus proyectos.
 
Su sueño es ser una gran ganadera y tener algo para el futuro de sus hijos.
texts.en: The members of the communal lender Rosa De Guadalupe meet regularly in Portoviejo, capital of Manabí province.  Narcisa is among them.  She is 27 and lives with her husband, who is a bus driver; they have two children, ages 8 and 1.  The oldest attends school.  In order to provide for her family's future, she plans to begin raising cows on vacant pasture land that her father owns but does not cultivate.  They are seeking this loan to buy a cow for milk production, so that they can sell milk as well as use this for household consumption.  Narcisa has received two former credits from the communal lender which have allowed her to complete several projects.  Her dream is to have a successful cattle farm and provide for her children's future.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Cruz

texts.es:
Cruz es un padre de familia, tiene  49 años de edad, tiene dos hijos menores de edad hijos. Cruz vive en la zona rural del distrito de Bambamarca de la ciudad de Cajamarca, en la región del mismo nombre.

Cruz  se dedica a la construcción de casas (Maestro de obras), esta actividad la realiza desde hace más de 20 años en diferentes partes de la provincia, aprendió esta actividad de su padre hace varios años, es decir conoce a la perfección el rubro.  Cruz  cuenta con clientela fidelizada a su servicio pues, reconocen el buen trabajo que realiza, esto lo ha hecho muy conocido en su zona.

Cruz está solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para que pueda comprar madera ya que a la fecha cuenta con un contrato de construcción de una casa de materia rustico en la zona, este rubro cuenta con una competencia estable en la zona.

Cruz es un padre entregado a su trabajo muy responsable, y honesto, su más grande anhelo es poder brindarle a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en:
Cruz is a 49 year old father who has two young children.  Cruz lives in a rural area in the Bambamarca district in the city of Cajamarca in the region of the same name.  

Cruz works in construction building houses (foreman).  He has been doing this in different parts of the province for more than 20 years.  He learned this trade from his father many years ago, that is to say, he knows this profession well.  He has a loyal clientele that recognizes the good work he does.  This has made him well-known in the region.  

Cruz is requesting a loan of 1000 nuevos soles through Edpyme Alternativa so that he can buy wood since he has a contract to build a house of rustic materials.  The competition for this trade is stable in his area.   

Cruz is a father who is dedicated to his work and is very responsible and honest.  His greatest desire is to give his children a better quality of life.

loans.use: purchase wood to build rustic houses.

loans.name: Adela

texts.es:
Adela tiene  54 años de edad, es madre soltera, ella vive con sus 02 hijos mayores hijos de edad. Ella cuenta con casa  propia la cual está ubicada en el distrito de Tambogrande en el departamento de Piura. Adela  vive en la parte rural de este distrito y solo  cuenta con el servicio de luz.

Adela se dedica a desarrollar labores de agricultura, actividad para la cual cuenta con 1.0 hectárea  de terreno agrícola que ha heredado en vida de sus padres, en dicho terreno tiene mango en producción.
También se dedica a la crianza de animales menores, los cuales al alcanzar tamaño y peso ideal los comercializa en el mercado local. Adela cuenta  con 10 años de experiencia en el negocio.

Adela está  solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para que ella pueda dar  mantenimiento del cultivo de mango, con esta acción el espera obtener una buena cosecha

Adela es una persona bastante hogareña y estimada por las personas de su comunidad, pues la consideran una mujer trabajadora y responsable.
texts.en:
Adela is 54 years old.  She is a single mother and lives with her two eldest children.   Adela owns her own home which is located in Tambogrande district, in Piura department.  She lives in the rural part of this district and the only service her home receives is electricity.

Adela works in farming.  She owns one hectare of agricultural land which she inherited from her parents.  She grows mangos on this land. 

Adela also raises animals which she sells in the local market when they reach an ideal size and weight.  She has ten years experience in this business.

Adela is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that she can take care of her mango crop.  In this way, she hopes to obtain a good harvest.

Adela is a home-loving person and well liked by the people in her community who consider her to be a hard-working and responsible person.

loans.use: to care for her crops

loans.name: T.c. 11.78 Vista Hermosa Group

texts.es:
El siguiente grupo se llama "Vista Hermosa" esta ubicado en la comunidad de las rosas, es un cerro que se encuentra escondido del municipio, pero las casas se empiezan a ver arriba casi en la cima, ya que en las faldas del cerro solo hay terrenos de cultivo y no hay casas, el nombre del grupo dicen los integrantes se deriva de la vista que se tiene cuando se llega a la comunidad, porque se puede ver todo el paisaje, los terrenos sembrados y los autos que pasan por la carretera, el grupo lo forman 7 personas, 4 mujeres y tres hombres, se dedican a vender ropa y tambien a criar animales para vender, toda la gente que vive en la comunidad tiene su propio terreno y de esta forma es como ganan dinero, ya sea vendiendo maiz o el zacate que se cosecha para darles de comer a los animales, Don Modesto es el representante del grupo, el señor se dedica a criar borregos tiene 15 años de experiencia en el negocio, por eso sabe que lo dificil es vacunar a los animales, la vacuna no es barata y para vacunar a muchos borregos es costoso, esto se tiene que hacer y no esperar a que el borrego se enferme para actuar, don Modesto dice que muchas personas que se dedican a lo mismo no vacunan sus animales y mas tarde son las consecuencias, es mejor vacunar para que crescan grandes y sanos. Tambien comenta que el prestamo le va ayudar mucho porque nesecita a un ovino semental, en su corral tiene borreguitas y le hace falta un macho, dentro de las metas de don Modesto es que sus borregas se carguen y den crias, de esta forma el en un tiempo tendria mas borregos que los que tiene en este momento, don Modesto es casado tiende 45 años de edad y 20 años cumplio ya de estar casado, tiene 5 hijos, 2 de sus hijos trabajan y 3 mas dependen de el, estan estudiando y el quiere darles el estudio hasta la preparatoria ya que no sabe si vaya poder con tantos gastos de universidad, don Modestos tiene su casa propia y su señora es ama de casa, y tambien le ayuda cuando son espocas de siembra y de cosecha, los nombres faltantes del grupo son los siguientes:
1.-Cristina, la señora vende ropa de segunda mano
2.-Maria Asunción, vende ropa en un tianguis: (calcetas, medias y collares)
3.-Angela, la señora tiene una pequeña tienda de dulces y abarrotes
4.-Alejandra, la señora se dedica a engordar borregos
5.-Arnulfo, el señor tiene una dulceria
6.-Gabriel, el señor se dedica a criar borregos.

loans.use: to buy domestic animals

loans.name: Carlos Enrique

texts.es:
Carlos es un padre de familia, tiene 23  años de edad, el es soltero  y tiene con 1 hijo menor de edad.Carlos cuenta con  casa propia la cual  está ubicada en la cual está ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Lambayeque, solo cuenta con servicios de agua, el lugar es una comunidad pequeña con un aproximado de 100  familias.

Carlos se dedica a la  comercialización de animales, entre ellos tenemos principalmente ganado caprino y ovino, haci como equinos, los cuales están ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio y cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen punto de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que siempre visitan la zona en donde vive, esta actividad la realiza desde su domicilio.  Carlos aprendió esta actividad de sus padres el se dedica a dicha labor desde hace varios años, es decir conoce a la perfección el rubro.

Carlos está solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 800  nuevos soles para que pueda invertir en la compra de cerdos con su respectivo alimento balanceado.

Carlos  es una  persona emprendedora y responsable, ella desea poder crecer como empresaria y poder alcanzar una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Carlos is a 23 year-old father.  He is single and has one dependent child.  Carlos owns his own home which is located in the rural area of Lambayeque district.  The only service his home receives is water.  He lives in a small community of approximately 100 families.

Carlos' business is selling animals: mainly goats and sheep but also horses.  He keeps the animals in an area behind his home and when they have reached a good level of development he offers them for sale to the traders who always visit his area.  He carries out his business from home.  Carlos learned this business from his parents and has been in this line of work for several years which means that he knows the job really well.

Carlos is requesting a loan for 800 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to invest in buying pigs and balanced feed for them.

Carlos is an entrepreneurial and responsible person who would like to grow as a businessman and achieve a better quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in buying pigs and pig feed

loans.name: Lusinda

texts.es:
Lusinda es una madre de familia de 49  años de edad, ella vive con sus  2 hijos menores es edad escolar. Lusinda vive en casa propia, la cual está ubicada en la  zona rural del distrito de Mórrope, en un caserío llamado Cruz del Medano ubicado a 15 minutos  de la ciudad de Mórrope, en donde solo cuenta con el servicio de agua solamente, el lugar es una comunidad pequeña con un aproximado de 200  familias.

Lusinda se dedica a la  comercialización  de animales menores en corrales ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio, ella suele criar ganado porcino, ovino y pavos y patos y cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen punto de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que siempre visitan la zona en donde vive, esta actividad la realiza desde su domicilio.  Lusinda aprendió esta actividad de sus padres y desde hace 20 años ella se dedica a dicha labor, es decir conoce a la perfección el rubro.

Lusinda está solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2200 nuevos soles para poder  invertir en la compra de aves menores para su engorde, con su respectivo alimento balanceado dichos animales.  

Lusinda es una mujer bastante trabajadora y que se esfuerza a diario por salir adelante y tener una mejor calidad de vida. Las personas que la conocen le consideran una persona  amable y siempre dispuesta a ayudar a los demás.
texts.en:
Lusinda is a 49-year-old mother living with her two minor, school age children.  Lusinda lives in her own house located in the rural part of Mórrope District in a hamlet called Cruz del Medano about 15 minutes from the city of Mórrope.  The house only has water and the community is small; it only has about 200 families.

Lusinda is a small farm animal merchant.  She raises them in corrals located in her back yard.  She tends to raise pigs, sheep, turkeys and ducks and when they reach a good stage of development she sells them to merchants that always frequent the area where she lives.  She runs her business from home.  Lusinda learned this activity from her parents and has been in this line of work for 20 years now, that is to say, she knows the occupation to perfection.

Lusinda is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a 2200 new sol loan to buy barnyard fowl to raise and to buy their respective balanced feed.

Lusinda is quite a hard working woman who strives daily to get ahead and have a better quality of life.  People who know her consider her to be kind and always willing to help others.

loans.use: to buy fowl.

loans.name: Dolores Del Carmen

texts.es:
Dolores de oficio administradora labora en una empresa privada, pues es el apoyo de sus hijos, ya que es madre soltera. 
Como objetivo ha sido la mejora a su casa, en donde ha venido reparando atreves de los años, hoy con Afodenic ha avanzado más rápido ya que se beneficia con los plazos, ya que tiene que cubrir otros gastos.
Con este nuevo préstamo será para comenzar hacer la cocina de concreto en donde comprara: bloques, arena, cemento, hierro, piedrín. Teniendo mejor espacio, y una cocina en mejores condiciones.
texts.en: Dolores works as an administrator in a private company, and is a single mother that supports her children.  She seeks credit to improve her housing conditions by making various repairs, and a loan from Afodenic will allow her to begin her project to build a better kitchen by obtaining construction materials such as cement blocks, sand, iron and stones.  Once finished, this will greatly improve her family's kitchen and living space.

loans.use: to buy cement for housing repairs

loans.name: Magali Karina

texts.es:
En la parroquia Andrés De Vera  de la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal Rosa De Guadalupe.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Magali, tiene 33 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos de  14, 12 y 7 años de edad, los dos mayores estudian en colegio y la menor en escuela. El marido es chofer.

Ella se dedica a la venta de sabanas, carteras, ropa por catálogo de varias marcas y productos de Esika (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas). Trabaja todos los días desde las 8h30 hasta las 17h00, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y bajo pedidos, ella deja a crédito sus productos y cobra semanalmente, dice que le encanta vender. Su mercadería la va a comprar a Guayaquil cada vez que necesita. Nos cuenta que lleva en este negocio tres años  y que le va muy bien y que lo mas vende son las sabanas.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar sabanas y carteras. Está en el Banco Comunal  hace  tres ciclos y le gusta porque con los créditos ella puede financiar su negocio. 

Su sueño es comprar un auto para realizar sus ventas más cómodamente.
texts.en: Magali is a member of the communal lender Rosa De Guadalupe, in Portoviejo, capital of the province of Manabi.  Magali is 33, married, and has three children aged 14, 12 and 7.  Her two oldest children study in high school, and the youngest is in primary. Her husband works as a driver.  Magali runs a business selling sheet sets, purses, catalog order clothes and Esika cosmetics, perfumes and women's accessories.  She works each day from 8:30 AM to 5 PM selling door to door and taking orders.  She allows her clients to order on credit and pay for products later.  She buys her merchandise in Guayaquil, travelling there as often as needed.  She has run her business for three years and notes that her most popular item are sheet sets.  Magali will use this loan to buy additional sheet sets and purses for re-sale. She hopes that with this loan her business will prosper further.  Her dream is to one day buy a car, in order to carry out her sales activities more easily.

loans.use: to buy sheet sets and purses

loans.name: Karina

texts.es: Karina  es una mujer esforzada, vive junto a su esposo y sus 3 hijos en su casa. Desde hace 5 años  decidió no solo ser ama de casa sino generar fuentes de ingresos viables y acordes con su tiempo, es así que aprovecho los espacios amplios de su casa y puso su granja de cuyes que en la actualidad esta criando y vendiendo cada cierto tiempo. Adicionalmente a esto realiza bellos bordados artesanales en su casa elaborando los trajes típicos de su zona. Dentro de las prendas que realiza son fustanes de tela bien confeccionado, aplicaciones de de diversos colores, entre ellos predomina el dorado y el plateado que dan como resultados un hermoso trabajo que agrada bastante a sus clientes, quienes solicitan de sus bordados en fechas especiales como son las fiestas de Santiago, muy celebrado en su zona. Es así que en los meses de julio hasta agosto es donde más trabajo tiene y donde necesita de mayor cantidad de materiales para  confeccionar hermosos trajes. Es su tercera vez que esta solicitando un crédito en MFP y se siente orgullosa de ella misma por haber permanecido puntual en todo este tiempo y también porque ha invertido adecuadamente sus préstamos anteriores de las cuales en corto tiempo ha visto los frutos, es por eso que considera que tiene una experiencia exitosa. Este dinero lo invertirá en la compra de hilos de diversos colores al por mayor para sus bordados, aplicaciones de lentejuelas e hilos dorados y plateado así como también fardos de tela.
texts.en:
Karina is a hard worker and lives with her husband and three children in her own home.  For five years she has been working not only as a homemaker but also helping to generate a decent income.  She has taken advantage of the extra space around the house and has set up a farm to raise and sell guinea pigs.  She also makes beautiful hand-embroidered regional costumes from her area.  The under-garments she makes are well-made slips with different colored appliqués, predominantly in gold and silver, which makes the work beautiful for the customer.  Most of her orders come in for special festivities such as Santiago, which are very much celebrated in the area.  The months of July and August are when her work increases and she needs more materials for the beautiful costumes.

This is her third loan through MFP and she is proud to have been punctual paying them back on time and using them adequately and seeing the results.  She feels like the experience has been successful.  This loan will be used to buy different-colored threads, wholesale, sequins, gold and silver thread appliqués, and rolls of fabric.

loans.use: To buy sequins, gold and silver thread, and rolls of fabric.

loans.name: Margarita Felipa

texts.es:
Margarita Felipa tiene 64 años, es casada vive con el esposo y dos hijos, vive en la Parroquia La Magdalena perteneciente al Canton Chimbo.

Margarita se dedica a la crianza de animales de corral como pollos, ovejas y cerdos. Las comprar la realiza en la Ciudad de Guaranda y las vende en La Magdalena y en la feria de los Sabados en Chimbo.

El credito solicita para la compra de animales y alimentacion para su crianza, el credito le apoyado de manera que aumentado los animales y ha podido ganar un poco mas de dinero. Ha enfrentado desafios como enfermedades de los animales que se han muerto, Su sueño es comprar un terreno para tener a los animales y ayudar a los nietos.

A Margarita le gusta ciudar de los animales y festejar las fiestas de la Parroquia.
texts.en:
Margarita Felipa, 64, is married and lives with her husband and two children in the parish of La Magdalena in the Chimbo Canton.

She raises farm animals such as chickens, sheep and pigs.  She buys them in the city of Guaranda and sells them in La Magdalena and at the Saturday fair in Chimbo.

The loan she is requesting is to buy more animals and animal feed, allowing her to earn more money.  She has lost some animals to illness.  Her dream is to buy more land where she can keep the animals and help out her grandchildren.

Margarita enjoys taking care of her animals and celebrating the parish festivities.

loans.use: To buy farm animals and animal feed.

loans.name: Gloria Maria Isabel

texts.es:
Gloria Maria Isabel tiene 58 años, es madre soltera vive con dos hijos, vive en la Parroquia La Magdalena perteneciente al Canton Chimbo.

Gloria se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz en ciclo corto. Las comprar la realiza en la Ciudad de Guaranda y las vende en La Magdalena y en la feria de los Sabados en Chimbo.

El credito solicita para la compra de  fertilizantes e insumos para los cultivos, el credito le apoyado a incrementar la produccion y aumentado los ingresos economicos. Ha enfrentado desafios como plagas y enfermedades de los cultivos, Su sueño es comprar un terreno para tener ingresos para dar la educacion a los hijos y tener para la comidad diaria.


Le gusta enseñar a los hijos a trabajar en el campo.
texts.en:
Gloria Maria Isabel, 58, is a single mother with two children.  She lives in the parish of La Magdalena which belongs to the Chimbo Canton.

Her means of income is growing short-cycle crops such as corn.  She makes her purchases in Guaranda City and later sells her crops in La Magdalena and at the Saturday fair in Chimbo.

She is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer and supplies for the crops.  The loan will help her increase production and income.  She has been up against insect plagues and crop illness.  Her dream is to buy land to earn more money for her childrens' education and to cover daily household expenses.

She enjoys teaching her children to work in the fields.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and supplies for her crops.

loans.name: Maria Margarita

texts.es:
DesD. hace 40 años María Margarita se dedica a confeccionar todo tipo D. prendas a terceros, labor que desempeña gracias a una amiga quien le enseñó a sus 9 años D. edad. En sus comienzos María Margarita cocía a mano lo que le encargaban sus clientes ya que no contaba con una máquina D. coser que le facilitara la producción, sin embargo, tiempo después pudo comprar su propia máquina y así conseguir más clientes que encargaran sus productos.
 
María Margarita trabaja diariamente para generar ingresos y ayudar con el sostenimiento D. su familia, ella vive en el municipio D. Itagüí en el departamento D. Antioquia, y es una microempresaria reconocida en su barrio y algunos aledaños gracias a su calidad y efectividad al momento D. entregar sus encargos, aunque actualmente presenta dificultades en este proceso ya que no cuenta con los insumos básicos para la producción, por lo cual solicita un préstamos con el cual comprar materia prima para la confección y comercialización D. prendas D. hogar y D. vestir.
texts.en:
For 40 years María Margarita has been a seamstress making all kinds of clothing for other people.  She was taught by a friend when she was just nine years old.  At first María Margarita maD. things by hand because she did not have a sewing machine to increase production.  But later on she was able to acquire her own machine and able to increase her customer base and receive more orders.

María Margarita works every day to make an income and support her family.  She lives in the town of Itagüí in the department of Antioquía.  She is a small business-owner renowned in the neighborhood   and near-by villages thanks to quality and delivery time.  Currently, however, she is undergoing a difficult process because she does not have the basic supplies for production.  Therefore she is requesting a loan to buy raw materials to make and sell the household items and clothing she produces.

loans.use: To buy sewing supplies to make her products.

loans.name: Irma

texts.es: Irma tiene 43 años y vive en compañía de su esposo y sus 3 hijos en casa de una familiar. Vio una gran oportunidad de negocios en su localidad, es así que desde hace 11 años posee una tienda, instalada en los espacios de su casa. Es así que todos los días por las mañanas atiende a sus clientes, en ocasiones su madre la apoya, ya que tiene un trabajo temporal. Pero el administra y proveer de mercadería su tienda es u trabajo principal, por ello es que desea contar con capital para así desarrollar su negocio y lograr que se estabilice económicamente. Hoy procura abastecer con productos que tiene más demanda y de marca reconocida en el mercado; además la atención que brinda  le asegura buenas ventas. Su mayor anhelo es ampliar su tienda para poder vender más productos.  Es la tercera vez que tiene un crédito con MFP y durante este tiempo de trabajo ha mejorado en la implementación de su tienda, recuerda de manera agradable el momento en que la invitaron a formar parte del banco comunal  que integra y que en la actualidad esta más consolidada. En esta oportunidad su crédito lo destinará en la compra al por mayor de productos, gaseosas y cerveza.
texts.en:
Irma, 43, lives with her husband and three children in a relative's house.  She recognized a great business opportunity in her hometown and, 11 years ago, set up a store in her house. Every morning, sometimes with her mother's help, she attends to customers.  She has another temporary job, but her main activity is managing and stocking the store.  Therefore she wants to have enough capital to develop the business and make it economically stable.

She tries to stock brand-name items that are well-known in the market and in much demand.  Her attention to detail pays off and has helped increase sales.  Her goal is to expand the store and sell more products.  This is her third loan through MFP and, during this time, she has been able to improve the store.  She has fond memories of when she received the invitation to join the communal bank with which she has a solid relationship.  She plans to use this loan to buy wholesale products, sodas and beer.

loans.use: To buy products, soda and beer.

loans.name: Doris

texts.es: Doris es una madre de familia dedicada al bienestar de su familia, de 34 años vive en compañía de su esposo y sus 3 hijos en la casa que adquirieron con sus esfuerzos. Tiene 11 años de experiencia en la realización de tejidos a mano y a telar que elabora en su casa, su mama también trabaja junto con ella  para lograr producir la cantidad solicitada por sus clientes. Sus tejidos en telar son tiras tejidas que sirven de correas para mochilas y carteras y para esto requiere fabricar por cientos; asimismo  también  teje chompas, gorros y chalinas de acuerdo al gusto de su clientela; de esta manera logra obtener ingresos mensuales que son muy  útiles en la economía de su hogar a la vez que le agrada realizar este trabajo porque le da la oportunidad de expresar su creatividad en la combinación de puntos y colores de las lana que utiliza en la elaboración de su prendas. El insumo básico de su trabajo es la lana en sus diferentes variedades y colores por lo que le es muy necesario abastecerse frecuentemente  para poder cumplir las exigencias de sus clientes. Es la tercera ocasión en que tiene un crédito con MFP en donde ha demostrado ser puntual en sus pagos porque en todo este tiempo ha invertido sabiamente sus créditos anteriores, en esta oportunidad no será diferente pues tiene claro el destino de su inversión. Por tanto espera la ayuda de cada uno de ustedes para que pueda concretar sus objetivos. Con el crédito comprará al por mayor de lana de variados colores, así mismo renovará su telar.
texts.en: Doris is a mother dedicated to the well-being of her family.  She is 34 and lives with her husband and 3 children in a house they acquired through their hard work.  She has 11 years of experience making weavings by hand, which she does in her home.  Her mother also works with her to produce the quantity requested by their customers.  Her weavings serve as backpacks and satchels.  This requires fabric in large quantities.  She also makes sweaters, hats, and scarves according to her customers’ tastes.  In this manner, she manages to obtain good monthly income that is used for her home’s expenses.  She is thankful for being able to do this work because she has the opportunity to express her creativity in the combination of patterns and colors of wool that she uses to make her garments.  Her basic supply is wool in different variety of colors, and that is why it is necessary to stock frequently to be able to meet the demands of her customers.  This is her third loan with Microfinanzas Prisma.  She has proven herself to be punctual with her payments because in all this time, she has invested her loans wisely.  This occasion will not be different because it is clear where she will invest the loan.  That is why she is hoping for the support of each one of you to meet her objectives.  With this loan, she will buy wool of various colors wholesale so she can revonate her loom.

loans.use: Comprar lana de diferentes colores y arreglará su telar.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies for making popsicles and also piglets

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building supplies

loans.name: Rosa Mercedes

texts.es:
Rosa es una madre de familia de 30 años de edad, vive con su hija en casa de sus padres, cuenta con los servicios de agua y luz, ubicado en el distrito de José Leonardo Ortíz que se encuentra en la provincia de Chiclayo.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la alta actividad comercial que existe de productos al por mayor y menor, y en las zonas aledañas se desarrolla la agricultura y ganadería.

Rosa labora prestando servicios de enfermería en un hospital de la zona, actividad que ejerce desde hace 5 años, pero a solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para realizar unas mejoras en la infraestructura de su casa, el crédito otorgado lo cubrirá con el salario que recibe en su trabajo y también solventará sus gastos diarios.

Rosa es una persona trabajadora que con esfuerzo y empeño a sabido salir adelante y lo único que quiere es brindarle lo mejor y más comodidades a su hija.
texts.en:
Rosa is a 30 year-old mother who lives with her daughter in her parents' home which receives water and electricity services.  The house is located in José Leonardo Ortíz district, in Chiclayo province.  This area is noted for the high level of commercial activity that exists, with people selling products both wholesale and retail.  In neighboring areas, people work in farming and livestock raising.

Rosa works as a nurse in a hospital in her area.  She has been in this line of work for five years.  She has requested a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to carry out some improvements to the infrastructure of her home.   She will repay her loan with the salary that she receives from her job which she will also use to cover her daily expenses.

Rosa is a hard-working person who, through her effort and determination, has known how to get ahead.  The only thing that she wants is to provide her daughter with the best and with more comforts in life.

loans.use: to make some improvements to the infrastructure of her home

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es:
María es madre de familia  de 37 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, no cuenta con los servicios básicos, ubicada en el distrito de Mórrope que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Se cacteriza por que sus pobladores desarrollan la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

María se dedica hace varios años a la crianza y venta de aves de corral como gallinas, pavos y gallos, al por menor, los cría en su corral que se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa para mayor seguridad de sus animales, los alimenta con comidad balanceada  y granos naturales, una vez que han completado su desarrollo los vende a los distintos mercados de Lambayeque y Chiclayo, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá solventar sus gastos familiares.

Para poder incrementar sus ventas a solicitado un préstamo de 600 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa para  comprar más alimentos que aseguren su crecimiento de sus animales y así ofrecerlos a un mejor precio a sus clientes, con las ganancias podrá pagar su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su hogar.  María es una mujer responsable, trabajadora y empeñosa que quiere mejorar  económicamente y brindarles otras oportunidades académicas a sus hijos.
texts.en:
María is a 37 year-old mother who lives with her husband and children in their own home which does not receive any basic services.  Their home is located in Mórrope district, in Lambayeque department.  The area is noted for the fact that its residents farm, raise livestock and make handicrafts.

María has been raising and selling poultry such as hens, turkeys and roosters retail, for several years.  She raises the animals in a pen which is located behind her home in order to keep her animals safe.  She feeds them with balanced animal feed and natural grains.  Once they have reached a certain level of development she sells them in different markets in Lambayeque and Chiclayo.  She uses the income she makes to cover her family expenses.

In order to increase her sales, María has requested a loan for 600 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that she can buy more feed in order to ensure the proper growth of her animals which she will then be able to sell to her customers at a better price.  With the profits that she makes, she will be able to repay her loan and improve her family's quality of life.  María is a responsible, hard-working and determined woman who would like to improve her financial situation and provide other educational opportunities for her children.

loans.use: to buy more balanced feed for her birds

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis Alberto de 23 años de edad, es soltero, vive con sus padres en su casa propia, la cual cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo.  Esta zona la actividad que desarrollan sus pobladores es el comercio al por mayor y menor, turismo y en las zonas aledañas la agricultura y ganadería.

Luis Alberto se dedica ha manejar su mototaxi (transporte utilizado por las personas en rutas pequeñas) desde hace 3 años, la cual la trabaja mañana y tarde en la zona donde vive, a pesar de la competencia que existe el aprovecha en transportar una buena cantidad de personas, con los ingresos podrá cubrir sus necesidades personales.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para brindar mantenimiento a su mototaxi y realizar algunos cambios de repuesto, al poderles ofrecer un buen servicio aumentará su clientela y por ende sus ganancias para tener una mejor calidad de vida.  Luis Alberto es muy conocido por ser una persona de  confianza, respetuoso y responsable con sus clientes que utilizan su transporte, con el objetivo de seguir mejorando en la vida para que más adelante pueda adquirir otra unidad móvil.
texts.en:
Luis Alberto is 23 years old, single, and lives with his parents in their own home in the province of Chiclayo, which has water and electricity service.  In this area, people work in wholesale and retail, tourism, and in the surrounding areas, agriculture and livestock.

Luis Alberto has worked for three years driving a mototaxi (a form of transport used on short routes).  He works in the morning and afternoon in the area where he lives.  Despite a lot of competition, he transports a number of people.  With his income, he can meet his needs.

He has asked for a loan of 1000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to perform maintenance on his mototaxi and change a few spares in order to offer a good service and expand his customer base and improve his income to have a better quality of life.  Luis Alberto is very well known as a trust-worthy, respectful, and responsible person by the customers who use his transport.  His goal is to continue improving in life so that in the future he can buy another vehicle.

loans.use: to do maintenance on his mototaxi and to change some spares.

loans.name: Evaristo

texts.es:
Evaristo de 50 años de edad, vive con su esposa y sus 3 hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con  servicio sólo de luz,  en el distrito de Mórrope que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque. Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agricola, ganadera y turismo (zona arqueológica).

Evaristo se dedica  a la crianza y venta de animales (cerdos y aves de corral) desde hace 10 años, su corral es apropiado y espaciosos donde se encuentran sus animales está en la parte posterior de su casa, los cría con alimentos balanceados como con pastos naturales  y una vez que tengan el peso y el tamaño ideal las ofrece en los diferentes mercados de la zona, con el dinero que va adquirir por la venta sus animales podrá atender sus necesidades diarias de su casa.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3000 nuevos soles para la compra de más animales y su respectivo alimento, al tenerlos bien alimentados los puede ofrecer a un mejor precio a sus clientes.  Evaristo es conocido en la zona por el buen servicio que brinda a sus clientes, es una persona trabajadora y dedicada que con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo a sabido sacar a su familia adelante.
texts.en:
Evaristo is 50 years old and lives with this wife and three children in their own home, which only has electricity.  It is located in the Mórrope district in the department of Lambayeque.  This area is characterized by agricultural activity, raising livestock, and tourism (archeological area). 

Evaristo has worked raising and selling animals (pigs and poultry) for ten years.  He raises the animals in an appropriate and spacious area in the back part of his home.  He raises them with balanced feed like natural grasses.  Once they are the ideal size and weight, he sells them at different markets in the area.  With the money he will earn from the sales of the animals, he can meet the daily needs of his household.

He has asked for a loan of 3000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to purchase more animals and feed for them so that they will be well feed and he can offer them at a better price to his customers.  Evaristo is known in his area for the good service he provides to his customers.  He is a hard-working and dedicated person with a lot of drive who works to improve life for his family.

loans.use: to purchase more animals and feed for them.

loans.name: Maria Esperanza

texts.es:
María de 66 años de edad, vive con su esposo, tiene 8 hijos los cuales llevan una vida independiente, tienen casa propia con servicio de agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito de Catacaos que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Toda esta zona sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería, artesanía y turismo.

María se dedica a la elaboración y venta de chicha de jora (es una bebida rica elaborada a base de maíz y  muy consumida en el norte del Perú) y harina de maíz, esta actividad lo realiza desde hace varios años, ya que es una costumbre que ha pasado de generación en generación en su familia. Últimamente se ha incrementado las ventas de la chicha de jora, lo que le ha favorecido para poder incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.

Teniendo la oportunidad de crecer María a solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de maíz y algunos utensilios para seguir elaborando su rica chicha de jora, con la finalidad de que su producto siga siendo el mejor y así sus clientes aumenten, para obtener mejores ganancias y solventar todas las necesidades del hogar.
texts.en:
María is 66 years old, and she lives with her husband.  She has eight children who live independently.  They have their own house, which has water and electrical services.  They live in the Catacaos district in the Piura department.  The people in this area devote themselves to agriculture, livestock, handicrafts, and tourism.

María makes and sells “chicha de jora” (a delicious, corn-based drink that is consumed a lot in the northern part of Perú).  She also sells corn flour.  She has been doing this for several years.  It is a custom that has been passed from generation to generation in her family.  Lately, her chicha de jora sales have increased.  This has helped her to be able to increase her income and improve her quality of life.

Having the opportunity to grow, María has requested a loan for 1,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  She will use the loan to buy a greater quantity of corn and some utensils in order to continue making her delicious chicha de jora.  Her aim is for her product to continue being the best, to have more customers, to get better earnings, and to pay for all of the household necessities.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of corn and some utensils in order to  make chicha de jora.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia, de 48 años, reside en el barrio Santa Rosa de la localidad de Puente Paucartambo (selva central peruana). Ahí formó su familia junto a Crispin, su esposo desde hace 29 años. Ambos tuvieron 7 hijos que con esfuerzo lograron darle lo que necesitan, hoy cuidan de su último hijo Rony. Con la tranquilidad que muestra, forjó su familia. Su principal motor económico e inspiración es “la agricultura”; sus 30 años de experiencia en los cultivos de palta, plátanos y cítricos le ayudaron para adquirir todo lo que hoy tiene. Una casa confortable, locales comerciales en puente Paucartambo (zona comercial), una casa en la capital del país y 40 hectáreas de terrenos cultivables, todo ello gracias a su trabajo continuo. “Yo hago negocio en la chacra”, comenta con mucho orgullo, “mando dos veces a la semana palta en grandes cantidades a la capital”, finaliza. Ahora quiere invertir en el cultivo de café, ya que incremento el precio de venta en el mercado. Ya dio un primer paso con la realización de viveros de café, donde tiene millares de plantitas creciendo para luego ser trasplantadas en los terrenos agrícolas. Además de vender las plantitas a S/. 400 soles por millar a terceras personas, adquiriendo así un dinero extra. Julia, pertenece al banco comunal “Luz del Futuro”, y este es el séptimo crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete una vez más a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Julia, de adquirir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en el pago del personal para trasplantar sus viveros de café en sus terrenos agrícolas.
texts.en:
Julia is 48 years old and lives in Santa Rosa neighborhood, in the town of Puente Paucartambo (in the central Peruvian jungle).  This is where she started her family together with Crispin; her husband of 29 years.  The couple have 7 children and, through their efforts, they have managed to provide them with what they need.  Now they are caring for their youngest son Rony.

With the calmness that she displays, Julia shaped her family.  Her main financial driving force and inspiration is "farming".  She has thirty years experience in growing avocados, bananas and citrus fruits.  This experience helped her to acquire everything that she has now: a comfortable home, business premises in Puente Paucartambo (a commercial area), a home in the country's capital city and 40 hectares of farmland.  She has all of this thanks to her continual work.  "I do business on the farm", she comments very proudly.  "Twice a week, I send large quantities of avocados to the capital", she adds.

Julia would now like to invest in growing coffee since its price on the market has increased.  She has already taken her first step by setting up coffee nurseries, where she has thousands of seedlings growing which will later be transplanted onto her farmland.  She also sells seedlings for 400 Peruvian soles per thousand to third parties which makes her extra money.

Julia is a member of the "Luz del Futuro" (Light of the Future) community bank and this is her seventh loan from MFP.  She hopes that you will help fund her loan so that she can continue achieving her goals.  On her part, she pledges once again to make her loan repayments on time as she has with her previous loans.  Julia enjoys being a member of her community bank because all the members are responsible people who are very supportive of each other.  With your support, Julia will invest the money she has requested in paying laborers to transplant her coffee seedlings onto her farmland.

loans.use: to hire day laborers

loans.name: Segundo Gustavo

texts.es:
Segundo es padre de familia  de 38 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, nocuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Mórrope que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Se cacteriza por laactividad agrícola, ganadera y artesanía.

Segundo se dedica hace unos años a la crianza y venta de aves de corral como gallinas, pavos y patos al por menor, los cría en su corral que se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa para mayor seguridad de sus animales, los alimenta con comidad balanceada  y granos naturales, una vez que han completado su desarrollo los vende a sus clientes, con los ingresos podrá solventar sus obligaciones familiares.

Ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 2000 nuevos soles para la compra de un lote (terreno) para habitarlo, con los ingresos que obtenga con la venta de sus animales podrá pagar el crédito adquirido y brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.  Segundo es una persona responsble y trabajador con la única intensión de mejorar  económicamente y  poderles dar una profesión a sus hijos en un futuro.
texts.en:
Segundo is a 38 year old father.  He lives with his wife and children in his own house.  They do not have basic services in that rural zone in the district of Mórrope, Lambayeque department.  The area is known for its agriculture, livestock, and handicrafts.

Segundo has been raising and selling barnyard fowl like chickens, turkeys, and duck for some years.  He sells them retail.  He raises them in a pen that is in the back of his house in order to make the animals safer.  He feeds them balanced feed and natural grains.  Once they have finished growing, he sells them to his customers.  With the income that he gets he will be able to pay for the family necessities.

He has requested a loan for 2,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa in order to buy a plot of land to live on.  With the income he gets from his animal sales he will be able to pay for the loan he got.  And, he will give his family a better quality of life.

Segundo is a responsible and hard-working person.  His only intention is to financially improve and to be able to give his children a profession in the future.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land to live on.

loans.name: Juana Lucila

texts.es:
Juana es una madre de familia de 46 años, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con los servicios de agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito de San José que se encuentra a una distancia corta de la provincia de Chiclayo.

El servicio que brinda Juana es de viscerado, lavado y limpieza de pescado y moluscos, actividad que realiza en el patio de su casa, pero también cuenta con una pequeña tienda en su casa donde ofrece a sus vecinos todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad.  Desea implementar su negocio para lo que a creído conveniente solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa  de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar más productos y seguir ofreciendo a sus clientes, con ambos ingresos podrá cubrir su crédito adquirido y tener una mejor calidad de vida parasu familia.

Juana es una persona que con esfuerzo y trabajo desea que sus hijos tengan un mejor nivel académico y se superen.
texts.en:
Juana is a 46 year old mother.  She lives with her husband and children in her own house.  She has water and electrical services.  They live in the San José district, which is a short distance from the Chiclayo province.

Juana eviscerates, washes, and cleans fish and mollusks.  She does this on the patio of her house.  She also has a small store in her house where she sells all types of basic needs products to her neighbors.  She wishes to supplement her business.

That is why she believed it was fitting to request a loan for 1,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  She will use the loan to buy more products and to continue selling to her customers.  With both incomes she will be able to cover the received loan and to have a better quality of life for her family.

Juana is a person, who with effort and work, wishes for her children to have a better educational level and for them to be successful.

loans.use: to buy more products for her store.

loans.name: Aida Mercedes

texts.es:
Aida  D. 57 años D. edad, vive con su esposo en su casa propia, cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, ubicada en   el distrito D. Puerto Eten que pertenece a la provincia D. Chiclayo.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad pesquera y la crianza D. animales D. corral.

DesD. unos 8 años aproximadamente Aida se ha dedicado a la venta D. abarrotes (productos que se utilizan diariamente como: leche, arroz, aciete, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, huevos,etc) su negocio lo ha colocado en su misma casa para su comodidad y seguridad, con las ganacias por la venta D. sus productos  trata D. cubrir  todos sus gastos y mejorar su nivel D. vida.

Para poder  ampliar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  D. 2000 nuevos soles para comprar más mercaderias, con el único ideal D. que su negocio crezca y tenga más productos para ofrecerles a sus clientes;  para cubrir su préstamo y sus obligaciones D. su casa.  Aida es una persona responsable, dedicada y trabajadora que se preocupa por tener más comodidades para su esposo y ella.
texts.en:
Aida is 57 years old and lives with her husband in their own house, which has full utilities service.  It is located in the district of Puerto Eten, which belongs to Chiclayo province.  This area is characterized by fishing and raising livestock.

For about the last 8 years, Aida has been working selling groceries (daily use products such as milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna, eggs, etc.).  She runs her business out of her home for comfort and safety.  With the profits from the sale of her products, she is able to cover all her costs and improve her standard of living.

In order to be able to expand her business, she is applying for a loan through Edpyme Alternativa of 2,000 New Soles.  She will use this to buy more merchandise, with the only idea being for her business to grow and to have more products to offer her clients, so as to meet her loan and home obligations.  Aida is a responsible, dedicated and hard-working person, who is concerned with having more comfort for her husband and herself.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise in order to grow her business.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
José Luis de 45 años  de edad, vive junto con su esposa en su casa propia, no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona se caracteriza porque los pobladores desarrollan la actividad agricola (siembran arroz y algodón), ganadera y turismo (tiene sitios arqueológica).

José Luis  se dedica  a la agricultura desde hace algunos años, tiene sus propias tierras de cultivo donde  siembra arroz, producto que se consume mucho en los alimentos diarios de todos los pobladores, con el dinero que obtendrá en la venta de su arroz, el cual lo realiza en los diferentes molinos de la zona podrá mejorar su calidad de vida.

Ha  solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 2000 nuevos soles para la compra de fertilizantes y pesticidas para mejorar sus tierras de cultivo y asegurarse de tener una muy buena producción de arroz para poder pagar el crédito brindado como incrementar sus ingresos y darles lo que necesita su esposa.  José Luis es conocido  por ser un hombre responsable y trabajador en la zona donde vive, todo el esfuerzo que demanda su trabajo es con la meta de sacar a los suyos adelante.
texts.en:
José Luis, 45, lives with his wife in his own home which is lacking in basic utilities, located in the rural part of the department of Lambayeque. This area is characterized by its agricultural activity (its inhabitants grow rice and cotton), livestock farming, and tourism (it has archeological sites). 

José Luis has worked in agriculture for a number of years. He has his own lands where he grows rice, a product that is much consumed in the daily diet of all the area's inhabitants. With the money he will receive from selling his rice, which he does at the various mills in the area, he will be able to improve his standard of living. 

He has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2,000 soles to purchase fertilizers and pesticides to improve his land. Thus he can assure a very good yield of rice in order to pay off the loan, as well as increase his earnings and provide necessities for his wife. José Luis is known for being a responsible and hardworking man in the area where he lives. All the effort demanded by his work is with the goal of getting his loved ones ahead.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and pesticides to improve the soil on his farm.

loans.name: Juan Miguel

texts.es:
Juan de 63 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad comercial, agricultura, ganadería y turismo.

La actividad que realiza Juan es como carpintero, la que realiza desde hace 20 años, su negocio lo tiene en su propio domicilio, tiene su propia clientela por el buen trabajo que hace, pero a solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 500 nuevos soles para mejorar el piso de su taller con la finalidad de tener mayor comodidad para que haga el trabajo que realiza, con los ingresos que obtenga  podrá pagar su crédito y mejorará la calidad de vida de su familia.

Juan es una persona dedicada a su trabajo, responsable y desea  que el negocio que tiene sea más grande para que su familia se siag superando en especial sus hijos.
texts.en:
Juan, 63, lives with his wife and children in his own home where they enjoy all the basic utility services, located in the province of Chiclayo. This region is characterized by its commercial activity, agriculture, livestock farming and tourism. 

Juan's business is carpentry, which he has done for twenty years. His business is located in his own home and he has his own clientele because of the good work that he does. However he has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 500 soles in order to make improvements to the floor of his workshop so that he may be more comfortable while doing his work. With the income he obtains he will be able to pay off his loan and improve his family's standard of living. 

Juan is a responsible person who is dedicated to his work. He would like his business to be bigger so that his family may continue to get ahead, especially his children.

loans.use: to make improvements to the floor of his workshop.

loans.name: Bercelia

texts.es:
Bercelia es una mujer soltera de 60 años de edad, vive en casa su casa propia, cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, ubicada en el distrito de José Leonardo O. que a la vez pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Los pobladores de éste distrito se dedican al comercio y a manejar transporte publico (taxi y mototaxi).

Bercelia  se dedica a la compra y venta de carne de pollo al por menor para el consumode las personas y los vende en el mercado Modelo de la ciudad de Chiclayo, actividad que realiza desde hace 10 años aproximadamente, este trabajo lo realiza todos los días por las mañanas desde muy temprano, con la finalidad de tener todo listo una vez que abren el mercado y así podrá atender a su clientela sin demorá, para que al final de de su jornada tenga los ingresos necesarios para solventar sus gastos personales.

El crédito que ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa es de 2000 nuevos soles y su destino será para comprar mayor cantidad de carne de pollo y gallina para seguir ofertándolo en el mercado a sus clientes ya que cuenta con clientela fija.  Bercelia desea que mas adelante tenga un negocio más grande y pueda vender toda clase de carnes en el mercado, para que mejore su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Bercelia is a single woman, 60 years of age, who lives in a house of her own with all the basic utilities, located in the district of José Leonardo O. which is also part of the province of Chiclayo. The district's inhabitants work in businesses and providing public transport (taxi and moto-taxi). 

Bercelia earns a living buying and selling chicken retail for individuals' consumption in the Modelo market of the city of Chiclayo, a business she has had for approximately ten years. She works every day starting from very early in the morning, for the purpose of having everything ready once the market opens. Thus she is able to serve her customers without delay so that, by the end of her day, she may have the necessary income to cover her personal expenses. 

The loan she has requested from Edpyme Alternative is for 2,000 soles. Its purpose is for buying large quantities of chicken to continue selling it to her customers at the market, since she has a stable customer base. Bercelia would like in the future to have a larger business and to be able to sell all kinds of meat at the market, so her quality of life will improve.

loans.use: to purchase large quantities of poultry meat for sale.

loans.name: Gladys Marcela

texts.es: La Sra. Gladys es conviviente de 47 años de edad, tiene 2 hijos donde uno de ellos dependen de ella. Gladys  se dedica a la venta de pasteles y empanadas donde lleva ya 8 años en el negocio, este trabajo comenzó de a poco con la idea de obtener más ganancias y así poder brindarle una mejor vida  a sus hijos gracias a los préstamo que ella solicito anteriormente pudo invertir más, también nos cuenta que es promotora en educación donde trabaja con niños de 0 a 3 años ayudando en su estimulación,  gracias a sus esfuerzo a podido construir su casa y ayudar con los gastos del hogar. El sueño de Gladys  es de mejorar su casa y de poner un negocio de internet bien implementado. Con el préstamo solicitado Gladys piensa implementar productos para su negocio  como harina, leche, huevo entre azucar entre otros.
texts.en: Gladys is 27 years old and has a live-in partner.  She has two children, one of which is her dependent.  Gladys has worked selling pastries and empanadas for eight years.  She started the business little by little with the idea of earning more income and thus being able to provide her children with a better life.  Thanks to the loans she previously requested, she was able to invest more.  She also tells us that she is an educator, working with children 0-3 years old to help with their stimulation.  Thanks to her efforts, she has been able to build her house and help with the household expenses.  Gladys’ dream is to improve her house and to set up an internet cafe.  With the loan requested, Gladys plans to buy products for her business like flour, milk, eggs and sugar, among others.

loans.use: to buy flour, milk and sugar.

loans.name: Martin

texts.en:
Martin is 53 years old and married with four adult-aged children. He is a farmer working in the Philippines.

Martin grows corn and has been doing this work for twenty years. He earns about 30,000 PHP per harvest season. Martin is asking for a loan of 25,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer and seeds for his farm.

In the future, Martin hopes that his farm's yields will improve to support the needs of his family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and seeds for his farm

loans.name: Al

texts.en:
Al is thirty years old, single and lives in Marapong in the Philippines. He is Barangay Health Worker and earns 4,000 PHP a month. 
 
Al has been a member of PMPC for two years. He has requested a loan to purchase housing materials. In the future Al hopes to finish his home.

loans.use: to purchase housing materials.

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.en:
Wilfredo is 34 years old and married with three school-aged children. He is a farmer working in the Philippines.

Wilfredo grows corn and has been doing so for ten years. He earns about 25,000 PHP per harvest season.

Wilfredo is asking for a loan of 15,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer and seeds for his farm. In the future, Wilfredo hopes that his farm’s production will improve to increase his support for his family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and seeds for his farm

loans.name: Ronie

texts.en: Ronie is 27 years old, married and has one child, an infant. He works on a farm growing corn and earns about PHP 30,000 per season. He is applying for a loan for PHP 25,000 to buy fertilizer and seed. His goal is to expand his farm so that he can improve his ability to support his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seed for a farm.

loans.name: Annabelle

texts.en: Annabel is 35 years old and lives in Sapang ama, Sapang Dalaga, Misamis Occidental. She is married, has one child and earns about PHP 3,600 a month running a beauty salon. Annabelle has been a member of PMPC for five years and is applying for a loan to buy more cosmetics for her salon. Her goal is to earn extra money to pay for the education of her children.

loans.use: buy more cosmetics.

location.town: Sapang Ama Sapang Dalaga Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Altantuya

texts.en:
Altantuya is 23 years old and lives with her husband and two daughters in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Her family lives in a small house, in the outer ger districts of the city. Both of her daughters attend kindergarten, while her husband works as a taxi driver at a local taxi company. 

Altantuya helps support her family by operating a clothing retail stall at Narantuul, the largest outdoor market in Mongolia. When Altantuya first began her business in 2007, she had 800,000 MNT in working capital from working at another person’s stall. 

Now Altantuya has 2,200,000 MNT in working capital made from her own stall. She purchases clothing for her business from China once or twice a month, depending on her income. 

Altantuya is requesting a 1,300,000 MNT to purchase clothing from Ereen City, China. She wants to use this loan to help support her in this very busy shopping season of the year. Her goal is to improve her business and then to be able to buy her own apartment. This will be more comfortable than living in her small house.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Jose Alfonso

texts.es:
José, tiene 42 años de edad, es originario del Sauce municipio de León, pero vive en Estelí hace mas de 10 años, el es comerciante, se dedica a la compra y venta de granos básicos, es padre de 4 hijos. Antes se dedicaba a la agricultura en el Sauce, pero después se vino a vivir  a  Estelí, ahí trabajo en una zapatería, al transcurrir el tiempo los años se dedico a la compra y venta de granos básicos , además en su tiempo libre trabaja como taxista que son otra fuente de ingresos que el tiene. El viaja a los pueblos de Yali, La Concordia, La Rica  para vender sus productos.     
El solicito el préstamo para comprar granos básicos tales como frijol y maíz. El espera que esta inversión mejores sus ventas, puede hacer mas clientes, abrir nuevas rutas de ventas para expandir su negocio en otros pueblos aledaños y tener mas producto que ofrecer. En sus planes futuros esta comprar ganado, quiere ir ahorrando para el futuro profesional de sus hijos.
texts.en: José is 42 years old and is a native of El Sauce, located in the Municipality of León.  However, he has lived in Estelí for over ten years.  He is the father of four children and is a merchant who works buying and selling basic grains.  Previously, he worked in farming in El Sauce but he later went to Estelí, where he worked at a cobbler’s shop.  Over time, he began to work buying and selling basic grains and in his spare time, he works as a taxi driver, which serves as another source of income.  He travels to the towns of Yali, La Concordia and La Rica to sell his products.  He is requesting the loan to buy basic grains such as beans and corn.  He hopes that with this loan, his sales will improve, he will gain more customers, open more sales routes to expand his business into other neighboring towns, and that he will have more products to sell.  His future plans include buying cattle and to save money for his children’s’ future as professionals.

loans.use: to buy basic grains such as beans and corn.

loans.name: Altangerel

texts.en: Altangerel is 37 years old and lives with her husband and two daughters in Ulaanbaatar, the capital of Mongolia. Her family lives in a small house in an outer district of the city. Her oldest daughter attends public school, while her youngest daughter attends kindergarten. Altangerel supports her family by operating two clothing stalls at Narantuul, the largest outdoor market in Mongolia. She opened her business in 2005 and gets help from her husband. She started by selling from someone else's stall but now owns a business that is worth 6,000,000 MNT. She is applying for a loan of 1,300,000 MNT to buy more clothes from China. She wants to have a good supply on hand for the very busy shopping season that's coming up soon. Her goal is to expand her business so she has enough money to improve her daughter's education.

loans.use: to buy more clothing to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Gantumur

texts.en: Mr.Gantumur is 48 years old and lives with his wife and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He is an experienced taxi driver who has been running a taxi business using his family car since 2000. His eldest daughter studies at university in the Czech Republic. His son recently completed driving lessons and has obtained a driver's license and recently became a taxi driver also, working for a taxi company. Gantumur’s family live in a ger, a traditional Mongolian nomadic tent, in ger district. Gantumur is planning to replace the fences around his plot of land and needs to buy building materials such as cement, sand, gravel, and concrete blocks. The loan he is taking will be used to buy these building materials.

loans.use: To buy some building materials such as cement, sand, gravel, and concrete blocks to build a fence or wall around his plot of land.

loans.name: Armando

texts.en: Armando is married with three adult children. He has been a farmer working in the Philippines for 33 years. Armando is asking for a loan of Php 27,000 to purchase fertilizers such as manure and rice seeds to plant in his farm. Oscar hopes this loan will grow his operations. Currently, he earns PHP 30,000 every cropping season. Armando wishes to enlarge his farm for additional source of income for the family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and seeds to grow rice

loans.name: Chachy's Group

texts.en:
Chachy is the leader of this group. She is 49 and married to a driver. Together with her husband she is bringing up a twelve- year-old daughter who studies at school. Chachy works as a cleaner to earn additional money to meet daily needs. She also breeds cattle and resells them at a higher price after being fattened. In this way she earns additional 5000 soms. With money from the loan Chachy wants to purchase more cattle to raise. In the future, Cachy wants to start repairing her house.

--- Where Did This Loan Come From? ---

This loan is brought to you by Mol Bulak Finance (MBF), a young, ambitious and socially-focused Microfinance Institution in Kyrgyzstan. 
MBF is strongly committed to the principles of sustainable development and upholds the triple bottom line – People (building human capital and taking care of its customers as well as society), Planet (keeping environmentally friendly) and Profit (earning revenue to expand autonomously). MBF is the only Microfinance Institute in Kyrgyzstan that delivers its services to customers 365 days a year. To learn more about MBF and view a Video presentation about the organization, please visit: http://www.kiva.org/about/aboutPartner?id=135 
If you would like to support and learn more about Kyrgyzstan and microfinance in Central Asia, please join our Lending Team - Supporters of Kyrgyzstan – Mol Bulak Finance at http://kiva.org/team/kyrgyzstan. Members will get special updates and news from Kiva Fellows in Kyrgyzstan and from the MBF staff.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Carmen

texts.en: Carmen is 35 years old and lives in Sebasi, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is married with five children. Carmen has had a shop that sells grocery products for three years. She requested a loan of 3,000.00 to purchase additional canned goods, noodles, and snacks to sell. Carmen has been a member of GDMPC for a year. In the future, she hopes to use her earnings from the business to provide a decent home, food, and education for her children.

loans.use: to purchase additional canned goods , noodles and snacks to sell

loans.name: Sairabubu's Group

texts.en:
Sairabubu is the leader of this group. She is a 59 year-old widow. Three years ago her husband died and Sairabubu had to earn money to cover family expenses. She began breeding cattle with an initial investment of 15000 soms. Selling the dairy products, she earns 2000 soms per month. She hopes to obtain the loan because she needs additional funds to purchase more cattle to raise. In the future Sairabubu wishes to build a new house for her son.

--- Where Did This Loan Come From? ---

This loan is brought to you by Mol Bulak Finance (MBF), a young, ambitious and socially-focused Microfinance Institution in Kyrgyzstan. 
MBF is strongly committed to the principles of sustainable development and upholds the triple bottom line – People (building human capital and taking care of its customers as well as society), Planet (keeping environmentally friendly) and Profit (earning revenue to expand autonomously). MBF is the only Microfinance Institute in Kyrgyzstan that delivers its services to customers 365 days a year. To learn more about MBF and view a Video presentation about the organization, please visit: http://www.kiva.org/about/aboutPartner?id=135 
If you would like to support and learn more about Kyrgyzstan and microfinance in Central Asia, please join our Lending Team - Supporters of Kyrgyzstan – Mol Bulak Finance at http://kiva.org/team/kyrgyzstan. Members will get special updates and news from Kiva Fellows in Kyrgyzstan and from the MBF staff.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Uyen's Group

texts.en:
Uyen is 39 years old and has two children who attend high school and secondary school. She makes a living as a farmer, raising rice and vegetables for her family and also to support a flock of 200 chickens who lay about 150 eggs a day. Local merchants come to her house to buy her products, and she is applying for a loan for 5,014,000 Vietnamese Dongs to buy more feed for her chickens 

Hien is 30 years old and has two children. She has a flock of chickens and is applying for a loan for 6,322,000 Vietnamese Dong to buy feed for them.

loans.use: to buy feed for two flocks of chickens.

loans.name: Khurelbaatar

texts.en: Mr. Khurelbaatar is a talented artist who is 46 years old. He lives with his wife and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital of Mongolia. Both of his children are in school and his older daughter graduates this year. In 1985, Khurelbaatar graduated from an art college and has worked as a freelance artist ever since. In 2008, he started making embroidered paintings on leather and today sells most of his paintings to tourists at various souvenir shops. He also owns a small plot of land and an old wooden house. He is planning to build a new home for his family and is applying for this loan to buy building materials.

loans.use: to buy building materials for a new home.

loans.name: Manh Tan-1-2 Group

texts.en:
Khanh is 45 years old with 3 children. Her oldest child is studying at Technical University and two others are in High school. Being a farmer, she focuses on growing rice, corn and vegetables. Her farming products are used to meet the family's food demand. To make money for her daily expenditure, she makes tofu and sells it in local market. Besides, she uses the by-product as food for pig raising which helps her get more profit from her pig raising. Participating in our credit program in second loan cycle, she is requesting a loan of 6,322,000 Vietnamese dong to buy beans.

Cuc is 30 years old with 1 child. She is raising 100 chickens for eggs. She wants to borrow a loan of 6,322,000 Vietnamese dong to buy some fans to cool down the chickens.

Chieu is 45 years old with 2 children. She is growing vegetables and raising chicken for meat. She needs a loan of 6,322,000 Vietnamese dong to buy food and fertilizer.

Du is 35 years old with 1 child. She is raising 200 chickens for eggs . She needs a loan of 6,322,000 Vietnamese dong to buy food for them.

Hoa is 28 years old with 1 child. She is raising pigs for meat. She is requesting a loan of 6,322,000 Vietnamese dong to buy food for them.

loans.use: to buy  food for her small business

loans.name: Dung's Group

texts.en:
Dung is 33 years old with 2 children. She is group leader with two members. All member have different businesses. Ms Dung is a experienced pig breeder. She received her first loan in 2010, which she invested in raising pigs for meat. The number of pigs has now increased to 10. Every three months, she gets a profit of 10 million dong from selling them. When she has free time, she works as a wood caver for a wood workshop that makes handicrafts.
