Margarita will use the proceeds of this loan to purchase 2 hectares of agricultural land where she plans to plant a larger quantity of coffee.

loans.use: to buy 2 hectares of land where she will cultivate coffee

loans.name: Antonia Del Carmen

texts.es: La señora Antonia , es una pequeña agricultora de la zona de Ticuantepe, durante 18 años que se dedica al cultivo de piña, la mayor afectación son las plagas y enfermedades que se le presentan ya que carecen de fertilización, los planes hacia su familia es mejor las condiciones de vida; ella  tuvo tres hijos de los cuales uno estudia en la universidad a pesar de los grades problemas económicos, lucha día a día para ver a su hijo graduado,  doña Antonia agradece el apoyo que le brinda Afodenic atrávez de fondos Kiva ya que para ella han sido de gran ayuda y poco a poco a realizado cambios en su vida . Con el financiamiento va a comprar fertilizantes e insumos para inducir las plantas de piña.
texts.en:
Antonia is a small farmer in the Ticuantepe area. For 18 years she has been growing pineapples. The greatest challenge she faces are the pests and diseases that affect her plants because she doesn't have enough fertilizer. Her plans for her family are to improve their quality of life. She has three children, only one of whom is studying at university because of their financial problems. She works hard every day in the hopes of seeing her son graduate.

Antonia is grateful for the support that she receives from Afodenic through Kiva funds because it has been a huge help for her and little by little she has been able to make changes in her life. With this loan she will purchase fertilizer and supplies to plant pineapples.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and supplies.

loans.name: Brigitte

texts.fr: Née en 1981 au Bénin, Brigitte est mariée à Pascal un secrétaire. Le couple a trois enfants tous scolarisés et encore à leur charge. Brigitte et son mari assurent ensemble les différentes charges de la famille. Brigitte vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Ayant fréquenté l’école jusqu’au secondaire, Brigitte mène comme activité la vente des fruits (ananas, orange, coco, etc.) au Bénin. Brigitte  s’approvisionne dans l’un des marchés du Bénin. C’est la deuxième fois que Brigitte  sollicite un financement auprès de ALIDé, en vue d’élever le niveau de son activité et de mieux satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle. Le premier crédit a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
Born in Benin in 1981, Brigitte is married to Pascal, an administrative assistant. The couple has three children, who all attend school and still depend on them financially. Brigitte and her husband take care of the various family expenses together. Brigitte lives together with her husband and children.
After going to school up to high-school level, Brigitte is active as a fruit seller in Benin, selling pineapples, oranges, coconuts, etc. Brigitte gets her supplies in one of Benin's markets. This is the second time that she is requesting funding from ALIDé in order to increase her business and to better satisfy demand from her customers. Her first loan was repaid correctly.

loans.use: to buy fruits

loans.name: Luz María

texts.es:
Luz María forma parte del banco comunal “El Canelo”, perteneciente a la ciudad de Linares. 
Ella se dedica a la producción y venta de mermeladas caseras desde hace 2 años. Promociona sus productos en su lugar de trabajo, a través de degustaciones. Luz María cuida a enfermos en una casa de reposo cada dos días ya que el horario laboral depende de los turnos que se designen en éste lugar. 
Compra sus productos  en una distribuidora y feria, cada vez que necesita abastecer su mercadería.
Con el crédito comprará frutas, azúcar y frascos de vidrio. 
Sus metas en su negocio son expandirse y promocionar su negocio, para tener más clientes y de ésta manera mayores ingresos. 
Luz María vive junto a su esposo y el menor de sus hijos de 20 años de edad. Ellos le ayudan a vender sus productos, después que Luz María realiza sus mermeladas. 
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida del apoyo brindado por Fondo esperanza, ya que el préstamo le ha servido como capital para invertir en mercadería. Además de la confianza mutua ejercida en el crédito. Respecto a las capacitaciones de ventas realizadas en las reuniones del grupo del banco comunal, ha podido incorporar estos aprendizajes en su propio negocio, por lo que ahora distribuye mejor sus ingresos y gastos de mejor manera, puesto que ahora no gasta sus ganancias. 
Linares es un importante centro urbano de la región del Maule, ubicado en la zona centro del país. En esta zona se desarrolla de manera importante la producción agrícola y también vitivinícola sobresaliendo en el ámbito de las exportaciones. Destacan los cultivos de cereales (arroz, trigo, maíz y avena), hortalizas (remolacha, repollo, lechuga y acelga y legumbres) y frutas. Linares es la principal provincia productora de arroz, en Chile; de hecho, el 78% de la producción nacional de este cereal se da en esta provincia, especialmente en la comuna de Parral.
texts.en:
Luz Maria participates in the community bank "El Canelo", which is situated in the city of Linares. 

She has been engaged in the production and sale of homemade jams for the last two years.  She promotes her products in her workplace with tastings. Luz María cares for patients in a nursing home every other day, and her working schedule depends on the shifts that they specify.  She buys her ingredients at a distributor and market, every time she needs to stock up on her merchandise.  With the loan, she will buy fruit, sugar and glass jars. Her goals are to expand her business and to promote it, in order to gain more customers and higher revenue. 

Luz Maria lives with her husband and their children, who are under 20 years old. They help her to sell her products, once Luz Maria has made the jams.
 
She is very happy and grateful for the support provided by Fonda Esperanza ("Hope Fund"), since the loan has served as capital to invest in merchandise.  In addition, she appreciates the mutual trust exhibited by the loan.  She has been able to incorporate the learnings from the sales training that takes place at the community bank's meetings into her own business, so that she now manages her income and expenses better, because now she does not spend her earnings. 

Linares is an important urban center in the region of Maule, located in the central part of the country. In this area there is significant agricultural production and also wine production, it also excels in the field of exports. Highlights include cereal crops (rice, wheat, corn and oats), vegetables (beets, cabbage, lettuce and spinach and beans) and fruit. Linares is the leading rice producing province in Chile, in fact, 78% of the national production of this crop takes place in this province, especially in the town of Parral.

loans.use: to buy fruit, sugar and glass jars for the production of jams.

loans.name: Miguel Ángel

texts.es:
Miguel Avalo vive en la cuidad de Managua capital ce Nicaragua. 
El señor es padre de familia responsable con muchos deseo de superación tanto para el como para su familia 
El señor visito nuestras oficina para solicitar un crédito  ya que quiere hacer mejoras en su  vivienda
El señor con el préstamo va a compra materiales de cómo cemento , bosque, arena, y pagar mano de obra 
El señor va hacer aplicación en un cuarto de habitación
texts.en:
Miguel Avalo lives in the city of Managua, capital of Nicaragua.
He is a responsible father with a strong desire to overcome, both for himself and his family.
He visited our office to request a loan, since he wants to improve his home.
With the loan, he is going to buy materials such as cement, wood and sand, and hire labour.
He is going to apply this cement coating to finish off the walls of a bedroom.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Marcela

texts.es: Marcela de 52 años, está casada con Marcos, de 61 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos, pero solo viven con uno de ellos: Omar de 25 años. Los tres como una gran familia, viven en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Puente Paucartambo (selva central peruana). Como mujer trabajadora ella apoya a su esposo en los gastos del hogar. Pues la agricultura, actividad de su esposo,  les proporcionan lo necesario para poder sobrevivir: “techo y comida”. Pero con una mirada emprendedora; Marcela nos comenta que  hace 7 años abrió una pequeña tienda de comestibles, donde vende productos de primera necesidad. Desde las primeras horas del día, los habitantes de la localidad visitan su tienda, pues ellos saben lo surtida que se mantiene. Ya en sus tiempos libres, de dedica a la costura, todos la conocen y, constantemente la buscan para ofrecerle trabajo. Además comenta que en tiempos de campaña agrícola se dedica a la compra y venta de café; comprando a los agricultores cada lata de café secado y preparado a S/. 80 soles, luego revendiendo la lata a una empresa reconocida a S/. 88 soles cada una, obteniendo un dinero extra. “Tengo que aprovechar la campaña”, afirma. Los clientes que ganó, le izó  aumentar sus ventas; es por ello que para más adelante ella desea comprarse una máquina industrial, con la que está segura podrá cocer con mayor facilidad y rapidez.   Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Luz del Futuro”, y este es el   sexto crédito con MFP, donde espera un pequeño préstamo para cumplir sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete una vez más a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Marcela, de obtener su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de café, pues están en campaña de cosecha.
texts.en: 52-year-old Marcela is married to 61-year-old Marcos.  They have 3 children, but only live with one of them: 25-year-old Omar.  The three are like a big family. They live in their own home located in the town of Puente Paucartambo (Peruvian central jungle). As a working woman, she helps her husband with the household expenses.  Agriculture, her husband’s business, provides the necessary for survival “food and shelter”.  But, with an entrepreneurial air, Marcela told us that 7 years ago she opened a small food store, where she sells basic goods.  From the early hours of the morning, the inhabitants of her town visit the store, since they know the level of stock she maintains. In her free time, she sews. Everyone knows her and they are constantly seeking her out to offer her work. In addition, she says that in the harvest season she buys and sells coffee – buying tins of dried coffee from agricultural producers for .80 New Peruvian Soles and reselling them at a profit to a recognized company for .88 New Peruvian Soles. “I have to take advantage of the harvest,” she affirms.  The customers she has gained caused her to increase her sales, which is why in the future she wants to buy herself an industrial machine with which she is sure she will be able to sew easier and faster.  She belongs to the communal bank “Luz del Future” “(Light of the Future) and this is her sixth loan with MFP, where she is waiting for a small loan so that she can reach her goals.  Moreover, she promises once again to make all her payments, as was the case with her previous loans.  In addition, she is grateful to be part of a communal bank, because all the members are responsible and supportive people. Marcela, having obtained your support, will invest the requested loan in the purchase of coffee, since they are in harvest season.

loans.use: to buy coffee.

loans.name: Piñas Coladas Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama "Piñas Coladas". Está ubicado en el estado de Puebla, México. El grupo está conformado por 9 integrantes. La señora Martina es integrante del grupo. Tiene 44 años, estudió hasta la primaria, es casada y tiene 2 hijos. Ella se dedica a la venta de zapatos, su negocio lo inicio hace 3 años ya que en ese tiempo tuvo problemas económicos ya que su esposo no tenia trabajo por lo que ella busco oportunidades y así pudo emprender este pequeño negocio. Solicita el préstamo para comprar mercancia. Sus clientes son personas en general. Al momento de solicitar este préstamo se siente entusiasmada ya que con este prestamo comprara más mercancia.   Quiere este prestamo para comprar zapatos de diferente marcas y diseños además de economicos que se amolde a la economia de sus clientes. También espera que con el préstamo peda surtirse para tener una mejor calidad de vida para ella y su familia, brindandoles a sus hijos una mejor educación ya que desea ver a sus hijos con una carrera profesional. Observaciones la señora que no se ve bien en la foto se llama, Dulce.
texts.en:
This group is called "Piñas Coladas" and it is located in the State of Puebla, Mexico.  The group has nine members.  Martina is one of the members.  She is 44 years old and has an elementary school level of education.  She is married and has two children.  Martina's business is selling shoes.  She started her business three years ago since she had some financial problems as her husband didn't have any work.  For this reason, she looked for opportunities and started her own small business.

Martina is requesting this loan to buy merchandise.  Her customers are the general public.  At the time of requesting this loan she is feeling enthusiastic because she will use her loan to buy more merchandise.  She would like to use her loan to buy different brands of shoes, in different styles.  She will also buy cheaper shoes that are affordable to her customers.  Martina hopes that this loan will enable her to stock her business so that she and her family can enjoy a better quality of life.  She hopes to provide her children with a better education since she would like to see them study for a degree.

(Note: the lady who can't be seen very well in the photo is called Dulce)

loans.use: to invest in footwear

loans.name: Houenoussou Iii Group

texts.fr: HOUENOUSSOU III est un groupement constitué de seize personnes et dont la présidente (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est nommée Pascaline. Les membres du groupe résident dans le même village au Bénin. Dans le but d’augmenter leur fonds de roulement, ce groupement sollicite pour la deuxième fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Née en 1970 au Bénin, Pascaline vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants dans une ville du Bénin. Pascaline est mariée à un cultivateur du nom de Dieudonné et a quatre enfants, qui sont tous  scolarisés. Pascaline assure ensemble avec son mari les différentes charges de la maison. Pascaline n'a jamais été à l'école. Depuis environs huit ans, Pascaline produit de l'huile de palme qu'elle vend à son domicile. Parallèlement à cette activité, Pascaline vend des tissus. Cette activité lui génère des revenus l'aidant à contribuer aux dépenses familiales. Pascaline achète ses produits dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. Ce premier prêt permettra certainement à Pascaline et aux autres membres du groupement HOUENOUSSOU III de rehausser le niveau de leur activité et d’accroître leur clientèle et leur revenu.
texts.en:
Houenoussou III is a group composed of sixteen people, whose president (who is raising her hand on the picture) is named Pascaline. The group's members live in the same village in Benin. In order to increase their working capital, this group is requesting a loan from ALIDé for the second time.
Born in Benin in 1970, Pascaline lives together with her husband and children in a town in Benin. She is married to a farmer named Dieudonné and has four children, who all attend school. Pascaline provides for the family's various expenses together with her husband. She never went to school.
For about eight years, Pascaline has been producing palm oil, which she sells out of her home. In parallel to this activity, Pascaline sells fabrics. This business generates revenues and helps her to contribute to family expenses. Pascaline purchases her products at one of Benin's markets.
This first loan will certainly allow Pascaline and the other members of the Houenoussou III group to raise their level of activity, grow their clientele and increase profits.

loans.use: to buy 20 tubs of palm fruit.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana  D. 46 años D. edad, vive con su esposo en casa propia (cuenta sólo con  servicio D. luz) ubicada en el distrito D. TambogranD. que pertenece al departamento D. Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana que se desarrolla en ella.

DesD. hace unos años Juana se dedica a la venta D. abarrotes (productos que se utilizan diariamente como: leche, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, huevos, etc) y D. bebidas. Su negocio se encuentra en su misma casa. Con las ganancias obtenidas Juana trata D. cubrir  todos sus gastos y mejorar su nivel D. vida.

Para poder  ampliar su negocio ha solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  D. 500 nuevos soles que le permitirá comprar más mercadería, con el único ideal D. que su negocio crezca y tenga más productos para ofrecerles a sus clientes y así poder cubrir su préstamo y las necesidades D. su casa.  Juana es una persona responsable, dedicada y trabajadora que se preocupa por tener más comodidades para su esposo y ella.
texts.en:
Juana, 46, lives with her husband in their own house (it only has electricity) located in TambogranD. District which belongs to Piura Department.  This zone is noted for farming, raising livestock and crafts.

For a few years now Juana has sold groceries (products that are used every day like: milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna, eggs, etc.) and beverages.  Her business is located in her house.  With profits obtained Juana tries to cover all her expenses and to improve her standard of living.

In order to expand the business, she has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 500 new sol loan that will make it possible for her to purchase more merchandise with the sole aim of having the business grow and to have more products available for her customers and thus be able to repay the loan and cover household needs.  Juana is a responsible, dedicated, hard working person who strives to have more comforts for her husband and herself.

loans.use: to buy groceries.

loans.name: Bidossessi Group

texts.fr: BIDOSSESSI est un groupement constitué de treize personnes et dont la présidente (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est nommée Martine. Les membres du groupe sont des parentés et habitent la même agglomération. Dans le but d’augmenter leur fonds de roulement, ce groupement sollicite pour la première fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Née en 1965 au Bénin, Martine est une veuve ayant trois enfants à sa charge. Martine assure seule ses différentes charges. Martine n'a jamais été à l'école. Depuis environs quinze ans, Martine vend du maïs, de la farine de manioc et aussi du "sodabi" (boisson locale) au Bénin. Cette activité lui génère des revenus l'aidant à subvenir à ses besoins. Martine achète ses produits dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. Ce premier prêt permettra certainement à Martine et aux autres membres du groupement BIDOSSESSI de rehausser le niveau de leur activité et d’accroître leur clientèle et leur revenu.
texts.en:
BIDOSSESSI is a group composed of thirteen people whose president (the one in the photo with her hand raised) is called Martine. The group members are related and live in the same town. With the goal of increasing their working capital, this group is requesting a loan from ALIDé for the first time. 

Born in 1965 in Benin, Martine is a widow having three children to support. She covers her different expense by herself. She never attended school. For about fifteen years, she has been selling corn, cassava flour, and also "sodabi" (a local beverage) in Benin. This business generates the revenues which support her. Martine purchases her goods at one of the markets in Benin. 

This initial loan will surely enable her and the other group members to boost their level of business and to grow their customer base and their revenues.

loans.use: to buy a 50-kg sack of corn and a 50-liter container of "sodabi"

loans.name: Wilson Javier

texts.es:
Wilson de 27 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en la casa de sus suegros, cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicado en el distrito de Reque que se encuentra a unos minutos de la provincia de Chiclayo.  Esta zona desarrolla  la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

El servicio que brinda Wilson es el alquiler de equipos de sonido, para todo tipo de eventos, en la zona donde vive. Cuenta con su propia clientela, por ser conocido y brindar un buen servicio, sus contratos para alquiler de música han aumentado, por eso a creído conveniente solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para la compra de más equipos para implementar su negocio y seguir brindando un buen servicio. Con los ingresos adquiridos podrá cubrir su crédito y solventar  gastos familiares.

Wilson es una persona muy responsable, de confianza y trabajadora por eso su negocio ha crecido y su anhelo es que más adelante pueda tener un servicio más completo para organizar eventos, para seguir ayudando a su familia a progresar.
texts.en:
Wilson, 27, lives with his wife and children in his in-laws’ house, which has water and electricity, and is located in Reque District a few minutes from Chiclayo Province.  This is a farming and livestock raising area.

The service that Wilson offers is sound equipment rental for all sorts of events in the zone where he lives.  He has his own clientele because he’s known for offering good customer service.  His rental contracts for sound equipment have increased and this is why he’s thought it convenient to request a 1500 new sol loan from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more equipment to supplement his business and continue providing good service.  With the income he will earn he will be able to repay the loan and cover family expenses.

Wilson is a very responsible, trustworthy, hard working person; this is why his business has grown and his dream for later on is to have a more complete service available to organize events and continue helping his family to progress.

loans.use: to buy sound equipment.

loans.name: Adriano

texts.es:
Adriano tiene 59 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en casa propia, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande - Piura.  La actividad que desarrollan es la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

Adriano desde hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado vacuno, su corral se encuentra en la parte externa de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales para que tengan una buena producción de leche, la que ofrece a los mismos pobladores de la zona o la vende en el mercado de Tambogrande. Cuenta con clientela fija por la buena calidad de leche que comercializa, con sus ingresos solventa las obligaciones familiares.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar más alimentos balanceados para que se incremente la producción de leche de su ganado y así podrá ofrecerla a un mejor precio para poder mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. 

Adriano es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable cuyo único deseo es que su negocio crezca para que sus hijos tengan mejores oportunidades de estudio.
texts.en:
Adriano, 59, and his wife and children live in a house they own in Tambogrande-Piura.  The local people make their living farming, raising livestock and making and selling handicrafts.

Adriano has operated a livestock business for many years, raising and selling cattle.  He keeps the cattle in a corral behind his house.  The cattle eat a balanced diet, including grass, something that contributes to the quality of the milk they produce.  He sells the milk locally and at the market in Tambogrande.  He has a regular set of customers who value the quality of the milk he sells.  The income from the business goes to supporting his family.

Adriano is applying to Edpyme Alternativa for a 1000 new soles loan that he will use to buy cattle feed, a supply of which he needs to ensure increased milk production.  The extra income will help him to improve the lives of his family.  

Adriano is a responsible, hard-working man whose only wish is to grow his busienss so that he can ensure that his children get a good education.

loans.use: to buy feed for livestock business.

loans.name: Javier

texts.es:
Javier es un padre de familia de 33 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en casa propia, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande- Piura. La casa de Javier no cuenta con los servicios básicos de luz, agua y desagüe. Su comunidad  se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera  y artesana.

Javier desde hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino y aves de corral, sus corrales se encuentran en la parte externa de su casa, son apropiados y amplios. Javier alimenta a sus animales con comida balanceada para que lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo y así podrá ofrecerlos  a mejores precios. Las ganancias obtenidas son para solventar los gastos diarios de su familia. Adicionalmente, Javier cuenta con una hectárea de terreno (herencia de su padre) en la cual siembra limón para vender en los mercados de su zona.

Javier ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar alimentos balanceados para sus animales y fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras con los ingresos que obtenidos podrá cubrir su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  

Javier es una persona trabajadora y responsable que lo único que quiere es que su familia se supere y  mejore económicamente.
texts.en:
Javier, 33, and his wife and children live in a house they own in Tambogrande-Piura.  The house lacks basic services: water, electricity, sewage.  The local people make their living farming, raising livestock and making and selling handicrafts.

Javier operates a business, raising and selling sheep and poultry.  He has a neat, spacious yard for the business behind his house.  He feeds the sheep and poultry a balanced diet so that they he can get the best price for them when they're ready for market.  The income from the business goes to supporting his family, as does the income from a small farm that he inherited from his father.  He sells the lemons that he grows on the farm at local markets.

Javier is applying to Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new soles loan that he will use to buy the supplies he needs--animal feed and fertilizer--for the business. The extra income will allow him to repay the loan and better provide for his family.

Javier is a responsible, hard-working man whose only wish is to grow his business so that he can improve the lives of his family.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his farming and livestock business.

loans.name: Jaime Luis

texts.es:
Jaime tiene 37 años de edad, es un hombre soltero y sin hijos. Vive en casa propia en una comunidad humilde y pequeña del distrito de Tambogrande – Piura. Cliente vive en la parte rural de este distrito y no cuenta con los servicios básicos de luz agua y desagüe. Jaime es conocido por ser una persona honrada y trabajadora.

Jaime se dedica a la crianza de ganado ovino, actualmente cuenta con 23 ovejas las cuales al alcanzar tamaño y peso ideal las comercializa en el mercado local. Jaime tiene una experiencia de 5 años en la ganadería. Además, Jaime es el actual Alcalde de la Municipalidad Delegada de Malingas,  en su mismo distrito y es una persona muy querida por lo habitantes de esta comunidad.

Jaime solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 2000 nuevos soles que invertirá en la compra de alimento balanceado para sus ovejas, así como para mejoras en su vivienda y uso personal. Sus padres son agricultores y clientes conocidos de Edpyme Alternativa tienen un muy buen récord de pagos. Jaime también es un cliente conocido de nuestra institución y su anterior crédito fue KIVA y lo canceló puntualmente.
texts.en:
Jaime, 37, is single and lives in a house he owns in Tambogrande-Piura.  The house is in a rural area and lacks basic services like water, electricity and sewage.

Jaime is known to be an honorable, hard-working man.  He operates a business, raising and selling sheep.  He has 23 sheep now that he will sell at a local market once they reach the ideal size and weight for sale.  Jaime has raised and sold animals for 5 years.  He is also the mayor of the town of Delegada de Malingas, a man widely respected by the people of the town.

Jaime is applying to Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new soles loan that he will use to buy supplies of animal feed for his livestock business, improve his house and meet personal expenses.  His parents are farmers and Edpyme Alternativa clients, with a good record of repaying their loans.  Jaime, too, is known to the bank and has a history of repaying past loans on time.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his livestock business and for personal expenses.

loans.name: Vicki Yajaira

texts.es:
Vicki es una madre soltera de 24 años de edad. Ella vive en casa propia junto a su hija, en el distrito de Tambogrande, en un caserío  mediano con deseos de superación. Vicki es una mujer trabajadora que lucha por el bienestar de su pequeña hija, ella tiene muchos deseos de mejorar su calidad de vida.

Vicki se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad y de higiene personal. Esta actividad la realiza en una parte de la sala de su domicilio.  Adicionalmente, vende  ropa recorriendo caseríos cercanos, donde cuenta con clientes fijos. 

Vicki solicita  un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa de 500 nuevos soles para comprar abarrotes (sal, agua, aceite) y productos de higiene personal (shampoo, desodorante, pasta dental) para surtir su bodega. Además, comprará ropa  pues sus clientes le han solicitado algunas prendas que desean comprarle.

Vicki es una mujer emprendedora y  tiene muchos deseos de obtener este crédito para poder mejorar sus negocios y así tener mayores ganancias que le permitan darle comodidades a su hija.
texts.en:
Vicki is a single mother aged 24.  She lives in her own house together with her daughter in a medium-sized village in the Tambogrande district.  She has a desire to succeed.  Vicki is a hard-working woman who struggles for the well-being of her young daughter; she is eager to improve their quality of life.

Vicki works selling staples and personal hygiene products, this activity takes place in a room in her home.  Additionally, she sells clothes in nearby villages, where she has regular customers.

Vicki is requesting a credit of 500 New Soles through Edpyme Alternativa to buy groceries (salt, water, oil) and personal hygiene products (shampoo, deodorant, toothpaste) to stock up her grocery store.  Also, she will buy clothes because her customers have requested a few items from her that they want to purchase.

Vicki is an enterprising woman and is keen to get this loan to be able to improve her businesses and thus increase her profits.  This will enable her to provide comforts for her daughter.

loans.use: To buy groceries and clothing items for her businesses.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase basic grains, meats, cheeses, refreshments, snacks, candy, personal hygiene products, and household cleaning products.

loans.name: Sonangnon Group

texts.fr: SONANGNON est un groupement constitué de dix sept personnes et dont la présidente (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est nommée Tatiana. Les membres du groupe résident dans le même village au Bénin. Dans le but d’augmenter leur fonds de roulement, ce groupement sollicite pour la première fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Née en 1988 au Bénin, Tatiana vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants dans une ville du Bénin. Tatiana est mariée à un certain Bruno et a deux enfants, dont un est scolarisé. Tatiana assure ensemble avec son mari les différentes charges de la maison. Tatiana n'a fréquenté que l'école primaire. Depuis environs sept ans, Tatiana prépare de la nourriture (riz accompagné de sauce)qu'elle vend dans un marché du Bénin. De façon secondaire, Tatiana vend des chaussures. Cette activité lui génère des revenus l'aidant à contribuer aux dépenses familiales. Tatiana achète ses produits dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. Ce premier prêt permettra certainement à Tatiana et aux autres membres du groupement SONANGNON de rehausser le niveau de leur activité et d’accroître leur clientèle et leur revenu.
texts.en:
SONANGNON is a group composed of seventeen persons whose president (the one in the photo with her hand raised) is named Tatiana. The group members reside in the same village in Benin. With the goal of increasing their working capital, this group is requesting a loan from ALIDé for the first time. Born in 1988 in Benin, Tatiana lives together with her husband and children in a city in Benin. She is married to a man named Bruno and has two children, one of whom is in school. Along with her husband, she ensures that the different household expenses are covered. 

Tatiana attended primary school only. For about seven years, she has made food (rice served with sauce) that she sells at a market in Benin. Secondarily, she sells shoes. This business generates the revenues which help her to meet family expenses. She purchases her goods at one of the markets in Benin. 

This initial loan will certainly enable Tatiana and the other members of the group SONANGNON to boost their level of business and to grow their customer base and their revenues.

loans.use: to buy 2 sacks of rice, a box of canned tomatoes, and some condiments.

loans.name: Victor Gerardo

texts.es:
Víctor tiene 52 años de edad. Vive con su esposa e hijo en una comunidad rural perteneciente al distrito de Tambogrande- Piura. La casa de Víctor no cuenta con todos los servicios básicos.

Víctor es un hombre trabajador que lucha por el bienestar de su familia. Él se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente a la cosecha de limón. Cuenta con clientela establecida en su zona y alrededores. 

Adicionalmente Víctor se dedica a la crianza de aves de corral, las cuales vende  en el mercado local. Víctor tiene grandes deseos de superación y es por ello que se ha propuesto invertir en su negocio para que este prospere a mayor escala.

Víctor solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que utilizará para  fertilizar sus cultivos de limón y el deshierbo de sus tierras. Además comprará alimento balanceado y algunas aves de corral para mejorar la producción de este segundo negocio.

Víctor ya ha trabajado con nuestra entidad y ha cancelado sus créditos puntual y responsablemente.
texts.en:
Víctor is 52 years old.  He lives with his wife and son in a rural community belonging to Tambogrande-Piura District.  Víctor’s house does not have all basic utilities.

Víctor is a hard working man who strives to provide wellbeing for his family.  He is a farmer, specifically lemons.  He has an established clientele in the area and its surroundings.

In addition, Víctor raises barnyard fowl that he sells in the local market.  Víctor has a great drive for self improvement and this is why he’s proposed to invest in his business so that it will prosper on a larger scale.

Víctor asks Edpyme Alternativa for a 1000 new sol loan that he’ll use to fertilize his lemon crops and to weed his fields.  In addition, he’ll buy nutritionally balanced feed and a few barnyard fowl to improve production in this second business.

Víctor has worked with our firm previously and has repaid his loans on time and responsibly.

loans.use: to fertilize his lemon crops and to buy nutritionally balanced animal feed.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.es:
Josefa es una clienta de  30 años de edad, vive con su novio  y  3 hijos, en casa propia ubicada en e distrito Las Lomas de Piura. Josefa vive en la parte rural  de este distrito y sólo cuenta con el servicio de energía eléctrica. Josefa tiene muchos deseos de sacar adelante a su familia y darles una mejor calidad de vida.

La actividad que desarrolla es la venta de chicha de jora la cual la realiza los días viernes, sábados y domingos en su domicilio, cuenta con clientes conocidos en la zona. La chicha de Jora es una bebida ancestral, fermentada y hecha a base de maíz, su consumo es muy común en la zona norte del Perú, sobre todo en las comunidades rurales.

Josefa también se dedica a la crianza de aves de corral que comercializa a los pobladores de su caserío y en el mercado de la localidad. Ella solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles que invertirá en la compra de insumos para el preparado de su chicha así como en realizar mejoras que su cocina necesita con suma urgencia. 

Este crédito le permitirá continuar desarrollando su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida. Josefa es una clienta conocida para Edpyme Alternativa y su primer crédito lo canceló puntualmente.
texts.en:
Josefa is a 30-year-old client who lives with her boyfriend and three children in their own home in the Las Lomas district in Piura.  Josefa lives in the rural part of this district, with only electricity service.  Josefa is eager to raise her family and give them a better quality of life.

The activity in which she works is selling chicha, which she does from home on Fridays, Saturdays and Sundays.  She has many recognized clients in the area.  Chicha de Jora is an ancient drink which is fermented and made from a corn base.  Its consumption is very common in the north of Peru, especially in rural communities.

Josefa also works raising poultry which she sells to the people of her village and the local market.  She is requesting a loan of 1,000 New Soles through Edpyme Alternativa to invest in the purchase of ingredients for the preparation of chicha, as well as make improvements to her kitchen that are urgently needed.

This loan will allow her to continue to develop her business and improve her quality of life.  Josefa is a client known to Edpyme Alternativa, and her first loan was promptly repaid.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for chica (a traditional drink) and to improve her kitchen.

loans.name: Olin

texts.es: Olin, de 21 años, es un hombre bueno y trabajador, está casado con Yeny, de 19 años, producto de su gran amor nació Oliver que ahora tiene 10 meses de nacido; los tres viven en su casa alquilada ubicada en la selva peruana (comunidad nativa Centro Punpuriani). Todas las mañanas, desde las primeras horas del día se dirige a su terreno de cultivo, donde cuida plátanos y yuca; que hace dos años viene plantando con mucho esmero y cuidado y que muy pronto podrá cosechar plátanos para luego venderlos a los comerciantes que vienen constantemente a la comunidad. Según cuenta, tiene 2 hectáreas de terrenos agrícolas que la sustentan económicamente y el cual se cosecha cada 15 días, produciéndole constantemente ganancias. Lo que más le gusta es poder ver como su esfuerzo tiene buenos resultados, a pesar de tener poco tiempo en la agricultura. De las 3 cuadras de terreno que posee le falta uno para ser sembrado, por lo que sembrará café y muy pronto construirá una casa para su esposa y su hijo. Por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para disponer del capital para continuar con su trabajo agrícola. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Abejitas de Pumpuriani” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete una vez más a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Olin de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios sacos de abono orgánico para esparcirlos en sus cultivos de café que hace poco sembró.
texts.en:
Olin, 21, is a good and hardworking man. He is married to Yeny, 19, and out of their great love was born Oliver who is now 10 months old. The three of them live in a rented house located in the Peruvian jungle (native community of Punpuriani Center). Each morning at dawn he goes to his plot of land where he is tending bananas and yucca, having begun planting with a lot of effort and care two years ago. He will be able to harvest bananas very soon in order to sell them to the merchants that regularly visit the community. According to Olin he has two hectares of agricultural land that support him economically and which he harvests every two weeks, bringing in regular profits. 

What he likes most is to see how his effort brings good results, in spite of having only worked in agriculture a short while. Of the three blocks of land he owns, one remains to be sowed. He plans to sow coffee plants, and very soon will build a house for his wife and son. Thus he hopes for the support of each of you in order to have the capital he needs to continue on in his farming work. 

He belongs to the communal bank "Abejitas de Pumpuriani" [Little Bees of Pumpuriani]. This is his second loan with MFP, where he hopes for a small loan with which to achieve his objectives. Therefore he promises once again to make his payments as he did with his previous loans. He is pleased to be a member of his communal bank because all of its members are responsible people and mutually supportive. Once he receives his support, Olin will invest the money in the purchase of several sacks of organic compost for spreading on the land where his coffee crop was recently sowed.

loans.use: to buy several sacks of organic compost.

loans.name: Guiliana Carmina

texts.es:
Carmina es una mujer emprendedora de 29 años de edad. Ella es madre soltera y vive con  sus dos pequeños hijos en una casa de concisión humilde ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí – Lambayeque. Esta es una comunidad rural cuya actividad principal es la agricultura y ganadería.

Carmina se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales,  cuenta con cuyes, patos, gallinas y chivos y es una persona muy conocida en su zona debido a la labor que realiza. Ella comercializa sus animales a los pobladores de su comunidad así como en el mercado del distrito. Cuenta con clientela establecida que prefieren sus servicios debido al a buena crianza de sus animales.

Carmina solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1700 nuevos soles que utilizará para la compra de animales y alimento balanceado para estos. Carmina tiene muchos deseos de ampliar su negocio y es por ello que este préstamo le sería de gran utilidad.
texts.en:
Carmina is an enterprising, 29-year-old woman.  She’s a single mother living with her two small children in a humble house located in Cayaltí-Lambayeque District.  This is a rural community whose main activity is farming and raising livestock.

Carmina raises animals to sell.  She has guinea pigs, ducks, chickens and goats.  She is a very well known person in her zone because of the work she does.  She sells her animals to local residents as well as at the district market.  She has an established clientele that prefer her services because of the good way she raises her animals.

Carmina asks Edpyme Alternativa for a 1700 new sol loan that she’ll use to buy animals and animal feed.  Carmina very much wants to expand the business and this is why this loan will be of so much use to her.

loans.use: to buy animals and animal feed.

loans.name: Assurance Group

texts.fr: ASSURANCE est un groupement constitué de quinze personnes et dont la présidente (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est nommée Mariam. Les membres du groupe résident dans le même quartier au Bénin. Dans le but d’augmenter leur fonds de roulement, ce groupement sollicite pour la première fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Née en 1961 au Bénin, Mariam vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants dans une ville du Bénin. Mariam est mariée à un cultivateur du nom de Djawara et a des enfants, qui sont tous  scolarisés. Mariam assure ensemble avec son mari les différentes charges de la maison. Depuis environs quinze ans, Mariam vend des cartes de recharges téléphoniques à son domicile. Cette activité lui génère des revenus l'aidant à contribuer aux dépenses familiales. Mariam achète ses produits dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. Ce premier prêt permettra certainement à Mariam et aux autres membres du groupement ASSURANCE de rehausser le niveau de leur activité et d’accroître leur clientèle et leur revenu.
texts.en:
Assurance is a group of fifteen members, and its president is named Mariam. The group members live in the same neighborhood in Benin. 

In order to increase their working capital, the group is seeking its first loan through Alidé.

Born in 1961 in Benin, Mariam lives with her husband and children in a city in Benin. Her husband Djawara is a farmer, and her children are all in school. Mariam and her husband pay the family's expenses jointly.

For fifteen years Mariam has been selling rechargeable phone cards from her home. This business generates revenue which helps her pay some of the family's expenses. She buys her products at one of Benin's markets.

This first loan will surely allow Miriam and other members of the Assurance group to expand their businesses and increase their client bases and revenues.

loans.use: to buy rechargeable phone cards wholesale.

loans.name: Elavagnon Group

texts.fr: ELAVAGNON est un groupement constitué de quinze personnes et dont la présidente (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est nommée Zénabou. Les membres du groupe résident dans le même quartier au Bénin. Dans le but d’augmenter leur fonds de roulement, ce groupement sollicite pour la première fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Née en 1982 au Bénin, Zénabou vit ensemble ses enfants dans une ville du Bénin. Zénabou ne vit plus avec son mari. Zénabou a cinq enfants à sa charge, dont quatre sont ses enfants. Tous les enfants de Zénabou  sont  scolarisés. Zénabou assure seule les diverses charges de ses enfants. Zénabou a très peu fréquenté l’école. Zénabou vend des ustensiles de cuisine dans une ville du Bénin. Cette activité lui génère des revenus l'aidant à assurer les besoins de ses enfants. Zénabou achète ses produits au Ghana, État voisin du Bénin. Ce premier prêt permettra certainement à Zénabou et aux autres membres du groupement ELAVAGNON de rehausser le niveau de leur activité et d’accroître leur clientèle et leur revenu.
texts.en:
Elavagnon is a group of fifteen members, and its president (with her hand raised) is Zénabou. The group's members live in the same neighborhood in Benin. To increase working capitA., the group is seeking its first loan through Alidé. 

Born in 1982 in Benin, Zénabou lives with her children in a city in Benin. Zénabou no longer lives with her husband. She supports five children, four of whom are her own. All of the children are in school. She lives with her children and supports them alone. Zénabou has little schooling.

Zénabou sells cooking utensils in a city in Benin. This business generates revenue for her, helping her to meet her children's needs. Zénabou buys her products in Ghana, a country bordering Benin.

This first loan will surely allow (?) and other members of the Elavagnon group to build their businesses and increase their client base and their income.

loans.use: to buy cooking utensils.

loans.name: Minagueze Group

texts.fr: MINAGUEZE est un groupement constitué de douze personnes et dont la présidente (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est nommée Bibiane. Les membres du groupe résident dans le même quartier au Bénin. Dans le but d’augmenter leur fonds de roulement, ce groupement sollicite pour la première fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Née en 1971 au Bénin, Bibiane vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants dans une ville du Bénin. Bibiane est mariée à un certain Sébastien et a des enfants, qui sont tous  scolarisés. Bibiane assure ensemble avec son mari les différentes charges de la maison. Depuis environs quinze ans, Bibiane vend du charbon de bois et de façon secondaire, des boissons à son domicile. Cette activité lui génère des revenus l'aidant à contribuer aux dépenses familiales. Bibiane achète ses produits dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. Ce premier prêt permettra certainement à Bibiane et aux autres membres du groupement MINAGUEZE de rehausser le niveau de leur activité et d’accroître leur clientèle et leur revenu.
texts.en:
MINAGUEZE is a group of 12 people, whose president (with her hand raised in the photo) is called Bibiane. The group members live in the same quarter of the Benin. In order to boost their working capital the group are seeking their first loan from ALIDé. Bibiane was born in 1971 in Benin, and lives with her husband and children in a town in Benin. She and her husband work together to see to the family's needs. For around 15 years, Bibiane has sold charcoal - and beverages as a side-line - from her home. This business generates money that helps her to contribute to the family's costs. Bibiane buys her goods from one of Benin's markets. 
This first loan will certainly allow Bibiane and other members of the MINAGUEZE group to boost their business and grow their customer base and revenues.

loans.use: to purchase coal and beverages

loans.name: Maria Esther

texts.es: María es cliente de hace mucho  años, ella en principio se dedicaba a la venta de cosméticos por catalogo de una empresa muy conocida, pero hace dos años atrás esa actividad la realiza en menor escala, siendo ahora su actividad principal la repostería, ella prepara para la venta pan, queques  de plátano , naranja y pies de manzana o limón, comercializando por la zona y algunas pastelerías de la zona sur,  también realiza tortas a pedido para cumpleaños, ella es una persona joven al igual que su esposo, tienen dos hijos pequeños a los que cuida mientras trabaja preparando sus masitas, el esposo trabaja con movilidad en el un taxi trufis de la zona sur, con el dinero de crédito comprar un horno industrial y así mejorar su elaboración de tortas, el deseo de la Sra. María es el de tener su propia pastelería, ya que la señora demuestra muchas ganas de superarse, es muy trabajadora y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
María has been a client for many years. At first she worked selling cosmetics by catalog from a well-known company, but for two years she has been doing that business on a smaller scale. Now her bakery is her main business. She makes and sells bread, banana and orange cakes and lemon and apple pies. She sells them in her area and also to several pastry shops further south. She also makes birthday cakes to order.

María and her husband are both young. They have two small children and she takes care of them while she works making her pastries. Her husband works in transportation and drives a taxi in the south. With the money from this loan María will buy an industrial oven and thus increase her cake production. María's dream is to have her own pastry shop. She shows a strong desire to get ahead and is very hard-working. She is grateful to the institution for the support they have given her.

loans.use: to purchase an industrial oven.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es: La Sra. Patricia nacida en Rio de Palometas, radica en Santa Cruz desde su niñez, vive hace mas de dos años en el barrio Palmira, Tiene tres hijos y convive con su marido hace dos años, ella se dedica a la panadería ella prepara para la venta pan, queques  de plátano, naranja y pies de manzana o limón, comercializando por la zona hace mas de dos años, es muy conocida en el barrio.   Su marido trabaja de Guardia de Seguridad en una empresa privada hace casi dos años, la Sra. Patricia es una persona muy trabajadora agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Patricia was born in Rio de Palometas. She has been living in Santa Cruz since childhood and for over two years she has been living in the Palmira neighborhood. She has three children and has been living with her husband for two years. She has a bakery and makes bread, banana and orange cakes and lemon and apple pies. She has been selling her products in her area for over two years and is well-known in her neighborhood. Her husband has been working as a security guard in a private company for almost two years. Patricia is very hard-working and is grateful for the support she has received from the institution.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale flour, butter and sugar.

loans.name: German

texts.es: El Sr. German Vive en la localidad de el torno,  es nacido en el departamento de Chuquisaca, tiene 3 hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar, es de ocupación carpintero, hace unos 14 años se dedica a esta actividad, el destino del crédito es para la compra de madera con lo que  realizar su trabajo, su esposa se dedica a la   venta de comida en el mercado de la comunidad. Se siente agradecido con la institución por el apoyo económico que siempre se le ha brindado, en los tiempos buenos y malos de su negocio, el es una persona muy trabajadora y muy dinámico su deseo es el de poder tener una fabrica de muebles.
texts.en:
German lives in El Torno. He was born in the Chuquisaca department. He has three school-aged children and he works as a carpenter. He has been in this business for 14 years. He will use this loan to purchase wood so that he can continue his work.

His wife works selling food in the community market. German is grateful to the institution for the economic support that they have always given him, in both the good and difficult times for his business. He is a very hard-working and dynamic person. His dream is to open a furniture factory.

loans.use: to purchase wood.

loans.name: Alegres De La Curva Group

texts.es: ESTE GRUPO SE LLAMA "ALEGRES DE LA CURVA" SE UBICA EN EL ESTADO DE MÉXICO ESTE PUEBLO SE CARACTERIZA POR TENER UNA PRESA Y SUS PAISAJES. EL GRUPO SE CONFORMA POR 10 INTEGRANTES Y ES LA SEGUNDA VEZ QUE SOLICITA UN PRESTAMO. LA SEÑORA MARIA ES LA TESORERA DEL GRUPO, ELLA SE DEDICA A LA COMERCIALISACION DE ABARROTES QUE INICIO HACE MAS DE 4 AÑOS. SOLICITA EL PRESTAMO PARA SURTIR MEJOR SU NEGOCIO, ESTUDIO HASTA LA PRIMARIA, ES CASADA, TIENE DOS HIJOS UNO DE 12 AÑOS Y LA OTRA DE 18 AÑOS. AL MOMENTO DE SOLICITAR EL PRESTAMO SE SIENTE CON MUCHAS GANAS DE SALIR ADELANTE, QUIERE EL PRESTAMO PARA COMPRAR JABON, AZUCAR, HUEVO, Y OTROS ARTICULOS PARA SU NEGOCIO LOS CUALES LE SOLICITAN SUS CLIENTES PORQUE SON PRODUCTOS BASICOS PARA EL CONSUMO DIARIO. CON LAS GANANCIAS PIENSA SEGUIR INVIRTIENDO EN SU NEGOCIO PARA EXPANDIRLO Y AUMENTAR EL NUMERO DE CLIENTES DE ESTA MANERA BRINDARLES UNA MEJOR CALIDAD DE VIDA A SU FAMILIA Y APOYAR CON LOS GASTOS ECONOMICOS.
texts.en: This group is called "ALEGRES DE LA CURVA" (the happy ones of the bend) and it’s located in the state of México, the town is characterized for having a dam and its landscapes.  The group is made up of 10 members and this is their second loan. Mrs. Maria is the treasurer of the group, she sells groceries, work that she began more than 4 years ago. She needs the loan to better stock her business. Mrs. Maria studied up to primary school, is married, and has two children, one is 12 and the other is 18 years old. At the moment that she requested this loan she feels the drive to get ahead in life and wants the loan to buy soap, sugar, eggs and other products for her business which are requested by her customers because they are basic household goods for daily consumption. With the profits she hopes to keep investing in her business, to expand and increase the number of customers so that she can give her family a greater quality of life and to help with their economic expenses.

loans.use: buy soap, sugar, eggs, and other items for a business.

loans.name: Maria Gladys

texts.es:
A sus 40 años de edad, Maria Gladys es una emprendedora consagrada a su negocio, donde vende productos por catálogo. El oficio lo aprendió hace 4 años gracias a una amiga quien le mostró los beneficios de dicha labor.

Maria Gladys es una luchadora incansable que espera tener mas clientes y mas posibilidades económicas para tener su negocio surtidos y con gran variedad. Esta emprendedora considera que su trabajo es una bendición ya que ella dispone de su tiempo y puede estar pendiente de su familia.

Actualmente Maria Gladys necesita de un préstamo para comprar mercancía y así incrementar su capacidad de comercialización mejorando proporcionalmente sus ventas.
texts.en:
At her 40 years of age, Maria Gladys is an enterprising woman dedicated to her business where she sells products by catalogue. She learned her trade 4 years ago thanks to a friend that showed her the benefits of the job.

Maria Gladys is a tireless fighter that hopes to have more customers and economic possibilities to have her business stocked with a greater variety of goods. She is hard working and considers that her work is a blessing since she sets her own schedule and is able to take care of her family.

At present, Maria Gladys needs the loan to buy merchandize and increase her business volume by improving her sales proportionately.

loans.use: buy merchandize from the catalogues that she sells.

loans.name: Yorleidis

texts.es:
Yorleidis se considera una joven luchadora, pues desde hace pocos meses se dedicó a vender helados, en casa de su tia donde vive actualmente ubicada en el municipio de Medellín departamento de Antioquia ya que su madre vive en bello , un municipio de este mismo departamento pero que está alejado del área metropolitana. Su negocio nació de la necesidad de contribuir con el pago de los gastos del hogar y de su sostenimiento. 

A sus 21 años de edad, Yorleidis se siente orgullosa de su labor y de su contribución a mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, Sin embargo hoy en día está esperando por una beca que el municipio de Medellín le otorga a la población para sus estudios, pues como ella misma lo afirma la educación es la mejor solución para el desarrollo humano y personal.

En el futuro Yorleidis espera tener un negocio de helados mas grande, que sea reconocida en el sector y que le permita generar mayores ingresos y para ir construyendo ese sueño necesita de un préstamo que le permitirá comprar mayor variedad de helados para incrementar sus ventas y así mismo sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Yorleidis considers herself to be a young fighter since a few months ago she began selling ice cream in her aunts home where she now resides located in the Medellín municipality, department of Antioquia since her mother lives in Bello, a municipality of the same department but is very far from the metropolitan area. Yorleidis’ business started out of necessity to help meet the household expenses and for her sustenance.

At her 21 years of age, Yorleidis feels proud of her work and her contribution to improve the quality of life of her family. Despite that, to this day she is waiting for a scholarship that the municipality of Medellín gives to the population for their education, as she asserts, an education is the best solution for human and personal development.

In the future, Yorleidis hopes to have a bigger ice cream business, that she is recognized in the area and that will allow her to have more income and to begin building that dream she needs a loan that will allow her to buy a greater variety of ice cream to increase her sales as her earnings.

loans.use: buy a greater variety of ice cream.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
A sus 50 años de edad, Luz Marina es una luchadora incansable, pues todavía estudia diariamente buscando perfeccionar su oficio de peluquera para ofrecer mejores servicios a las clientas que frecuentan su sala de belleza ubicada en Medellín-Colombia. De lunes a domingo, Luz Marina abre las puertas de su peluquería con la esperanza de obtener suficientes recursos para contribuir al cubrimiento de los gastos del hogar, pues con lo que su esposo gana no es suficiente para suplir sus necesidades básicas. 
 
En el futuro, esta emprendedora, sueña con tener su propio SPA y para ello lucha día a día, por ahora, necesita de un préstamo para comprar algunos equipos y así mejorar sus servicios.
texts.en:
At her 50 years of age, Luz Marina is a tireless fighter since she still studies everyday to perfect her trade as a hairdresser to give better services to her customers that frequent her beauty salon located in Medellín-Colombia. From Monday through Sunday, Luz Marina opens the doors to her hairdresser’s shop with the hope of having enough resources to contribute in meeting the household expenses since what her husband earns is not enough to meet their basic needs.

In the future, this enterprising woman dreams of having her own spa and to achieve it she works hard everyday. For now, she needs a loan to buy some equipment to better improve her services.

loans.use: buy some equipment for her beauty salon to improve her services.

loans.name: Gocha

texts.en:
Gocha is a farmer from the village of Kvitiri, Tskaltubo District, West Georgia. He lives with his wife Ella, a 21-year-old son, and a 17-year-old daughter. 

The only source of income for the family is agriculture. In particular, they have small dairy farm of two cows, whose milk is used for cheese production. Gocha and Ella sell the cheese at a local open market. The family also owns three greenhouses, where they grow cucumbers. Harvested cucumbers are also sold on the open market by the family members. 

With the requested loan Gocha plans to purchase cucumber seeds and fertilizer. After fertilizing the land, the quality and quantity of the harvest will increase and the family will be able to earn more. An increase in their income will enable Gocha and Ella to start renovating their house, which is old and needs some repair. The family will enjoy better living conditions in their renovated house.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and cucumbers seeds

loans.name: Indiana

texts.en:
Indiana comes from the village of Partskhanakanebi, in the Imereti Region. She is 38 years old and lives with her husband Zaza and her parents.

Indiana and Zaza lead the farming activities of the family. They have a greenhouse with a total area of 180 square meters. In the period from November to April they grow greens in the greenhouse. In the summer months the greenhouse is used for tomato growing. Greens are sold to the wholesalers and the tomatoes are sold in the open market of Kutaisi (a nearby town). 

Along with the greenhouse the family owns 1000 square meters of land, where they grow vegetables such as eggplant, peppers, and greens. Their harvested vegetables are sold in the Kutaisi market.

Also the family has a pig, the piglets of which are sold in the village. The total average monthly income of the family is approximately 800 Laris. 

Indiana requested a loan to purchase fertilizer. After fertilizing the family will get more and better quality vegetables and greens, and consequently more income. In the future Indiana plans to reinvest the profit in the business. Part of the profit will be used for improvement of family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for the farm

loans.name: Nino

texts.en:
Nino is a 48-year-old farmer from the village of Pereta, Imereti Region, West Georgia. She is married and lives in the village with her husband Eldar, a 17-year-old son, and a 10-year-old daughter. Their children go to the village school. 

Nino and Eldar earn approximately 900 Laris per month from agricultural activities. They have three milk cows; they produce cheese, which is sold at the local market. Also they have a vineyard with 1500 wine trees. The grapes are used for producing wine, which is sold in the village. 

With the requested loan Nino plans to expand the dairy farm by purchasing an additional milk cow. Nino will be able to produce more cheese and get more income from cheese sales. Nino regularly saves money for investing in the further development of the farm. She hopes that in the future the scale and the profitability of their farm will increase.

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow

loans.name: Lida

texts.es: Lida, de 25 años, es una mujer alegre y responsable, es madre soltera de 2 hermosos hijos Jeyson de 8 y Jeniffer de 3 meses de nacida; ellos viven en su casa propia ubicada en la selva peruana (comunidad nativa Centro Pumpuriani). Hace 2 años que se dedica a la siembra de diferentes productos como plátano, yuca y maíz híbrido (llamado también polenta); del cual menciona le sirve para poder obtener ganancias en diferentes temporadas del año: como por ejemplo, el maíz lo cosecha a los 6 meses de plantación, la yuca después de cosechar el maíz y el plátano cada 15 días; eso le ayuda a invertir más. Cuando sus cultivos están maduros; los vende a los compradores que llegan los fines de semana a la comunidad nativa; lo que más le agrada a Lida es poder sembrar diferentes variedades de frutos; además de dedicarse en sus tiempos libres a cultivar y machetear en otros terrenos agrícolas, donde le pagan un dinero extra de acuerdo al periodo de trabajo que dura. Ahora tiene planes de sembrar cítricos, ya que estas plantaciones son cuidadas durante 8 años para que proporcionen fruto; tiempo suficiente para poder generar mayores ganancias a futuro. Mientras tanto está aprovechando la cosecha de café en estos meses, donde está segura podrá obtener muchas ganancias. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Abejitas de Pumpuriani”, y este es el tercer crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para el logro de sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete una vez más a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Lida de obtener su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios sacos de abono orgánico para esparcirlos entre sus cultivos de café y plátanos.
texts.en: Lida is 25 years old. She is a cheerful and responsible woman and a single mother of 2 beautiful children:  Jeyson,  8 and Jeniffer,   3 months old. They live in their own house located in the Peruvian jungle (a native community called Centro Pumpuriani). For 2 years she has planted different products, such as plantains, yucca, and hybrid corn. This brings her earnings at different times of the year. For example, she harvests the corn 6 months after planting, the yucca after the corn, and the plantains every two weeks. This helps her invest more. When her crops are ready, she sells them to buyers who come on weekends to the native community. What Lida likes the most is being able to plant different varieties of products, in addition to spending her free time planting and clearing on other land, where they pay her extra money according to how long she works there. Now she plans to plant citrus, since these crops are grown for 8 years before they begin producing- enough time to be able to generate more income in the future. Meanwhile, she is taking advantage of the coffee harvest these months, when she for sure will be able to make some income. She belongs to the “Abejitas de Pumpuriani” [Little Bees of Pumpuriani] community bank, and this is her third loan with MFP. She hopes to have their cooperation to achieve her goals. She is also committed once again to making her payments, as with the previous loans she had. In addition, she likes being a part of her community bank because all of its members are responsible and supportive people. With your support, Lida will invest the money she has asked for in buying various sacks of organic fertilizer to spread on her coffee and plantain plantings.

loans.use: to buy several sacks of organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Vepkhia

texts.en:
Vepkhia comes from the village of Vartsikhe in the Imereti District of West Georgia. He is 40 years old and lives in the village with his 80-year-old mother, 16-year-old son, and 13-year-old daughter. The children all go to school. 

Vepkhia has four milk cows and three calves. He produces traditional Georgian cheese and sells it at the local open market. Also he has two greenhouses, where greens and tomatoes are grown. Vepkhia sells them at the open market as well. The total average monthly income of the family is approximately 500 Laris, including the pension of Vepkhia's mother. 

With the requested loan Vepkhia plans to construct a third greenhouse for growing greens and tomatoes. It will increase the amount of his harvest and thus the income from sales by 30%. The increased income will allow the family to improve their living conditions, through purchasing new household goods, as well as to finance the education of their children in the future.

loans.use: to purchase materials for greenhouse construction

loans.name: Teresa De Jesús

texts.es:
El amor por la cocina, las ganas de salir adelante y  la necesidad de contribuir económicamente para que su familia mejore su calidad de vida, motivaron a Teresa a hacer de su pasión su propio negocio. Desde hace ya varios años, esta emprendedora se dedica a la elaboración de tortas y postres para ocasiones especiales,  los pedidos, que son realizados por sus vecinos y amigos cada vez cobran más fuerza, puesto que son de un sabor único, como ella misma lo afirma orgullosa. 
 
Desde la comodidad de su cocina, Teresa realiza dichas preparaciones y en los lugares donde es requerida atiende las celebraciones; en el futuro sueña con ampliar su negocio y ofrecer cada vez más productos, así mismo desea apoyar a sus hijos para brindarles una buena educación. 
 
Actualmente, necesita de un préstamo para comprar implementos que le permitan mejorar sus servicios.
texts.en:
The love of cooking, the drive to get ahead and the necessity to contribute financially so that her family improves their quality of life motivated Teresa to make her passion her own business. For some years, this enterprising woman has made cakes and desserts for special occasions, the orders are made by her neighbors and friends which are getting more popular since they have a unique taste as she herself asserts proudly.

From the comfort of her kitchen, Teresa makes her preparations and in the places where she is required attends the celebrations. In the future she dreams of expanding her business and offering more products as time goes by as well as supporting her children by giving them a good education.

At present, she needs a loan to buy supplies that will allow her to improve her services.

loans.use: buy supplies to prepare and sell her food.

loans.name: Elva

texts.es: Elva, D. 53 años, es una mujer alegre y fuerte, está casada con Nicanor, D. 52 años, ambos tienen 6 hijos, pero solo viven con 2 D. ellos, Madai D. 18 y Vian D. 7 años, en una casa alquilada ubicada en la selva central (Yurinaki). DesD. que era niña se dedico a la agricultura, “el campo es mi vida”, afirma; en esos tiempos ayudaba a alzar la tierra para poder sembrar, pero ya cuando era joven ahorró lo suficiente y a los 19 años compró su propio terreno D. cultivo; desD. entonces se dedica a la siembra D. café, plátano y maíz. Elva tiene una pequeña casa en la comunidad nativa Centro Pumpuriani, ahí viaja todos los fines D. semana para cuidar su terreno D. cultivo, ya cuando están maduros los venD. en el mercado central D. su ciudad (Yurinaki). Según nos cuenta antes no tenia el capital suficiente para contratar peones que le ayuden a cosechar el grano maduro D. café, pues lo hacía con su esposo,  “Los dos trabajamos duro, para sacar a tiempo nuestro café”, comenta. Ahora que trabaja con su banco comunal, pueD. invertir capital para poder contratar peones y D. esa manera obtener ganancia en menor tiempo. En los próximos meses juntara el capital necesario para comprar un auto, y D. esa manera trasladarse constantemente a su terreno D. cultivo. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Abejitas D. Pumpuriani”, y este es el quinto crédito con MFP, donD. espera obtener el apoyo financiero para poder concretar sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete una vez más a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte D. su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Elva D. obtener su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra D. varios sacos D. abono orgánico para esparcirlos en su cultivos D. café que hace poco sembró, y que está segura le brindarán buenos granos.
texts.en:
Elva is 53 years old.  She is a cheerful and strong woman who is married to 52 year-old Nicanor.  The couple have six children though they only live with two of them: 18 year-old Madai and 7 year-old Vian.  The family lives in a rental house which is located in the central jungle (Yurinaki).  Elva has been farming since she was a young girl.  "The land is my life" she admits.  When she was a girl she would help to prepare the land for sowing but as a young girl she saved up enough money and, when she was 19, she bought her own plot of farm land.  Since that time, she has been growing coffee, bananas and corn.

Elva has a small house in the indigenous community of Centro Pumpuriani.  She travels there every weekend to care for her farm land.  When her crops are ripe, she sells them in the central market in Yurinaki.  She tells us that in the past she didn't have enough capital to hire laborers to help her harvest her ripe coffee beans and so she did the work together with her husband. "The two of us worked hard to harvest our coffee on time", she says.  Now that she is working with her community bank, she is able to invest capital in hiring laborers and, in this way, she can make profits in less time.

In the coming months, Elva will put together the capital she needs to buy a car.  In this way she will be able to travel to her farm land all the time.  Elva belongs to the "Abejitas D. Pumpuriani" (Little Bees of Pumpuriani) community bank and this is her fifth loan from MFP.  She hopes to obtain the financial support she needs to achieve her goals.  On her part, she pledges once again to make her repayments on time as she has with her previous loans.

Elva enjoys being a member of her community bank because all the members are responsible people and very supportive of each other.  With your support, Elva will invest the money she has requested in buying several sacks of organic fertilizer to spread over her coffee crops which she recently sowed.  She is certain that they will proviD. good beans.

loans.use: to buy several sacks of organic manure

loans.name: Rosa Idalides

texts.es:
Después de aprender el oficio de la confección, tras la muerte de su esposo y quedar a cargo de sus tres hijos, Rosa Idalides se vio en la necesidad de iniciar a trabajar desde su casa confeccionándole a terceros con el fin de generar ingresos, subsistir y mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia. Desde entonces y debido a su tenacidad y esfuerzo, esta emprendedora logró hacerse a un taller gracias a los ahorros adquiridos con su trabajo y generando dos empleos, lo que la llena de satisfacción.
 
Como gran visionaria, Rosa espera seguir creciendo su negocio hasta posicionarse en el mercado y convertirse en una gran generadora de empleo, para ello y con el fin de adquirir capital de trabajo para responder a los pedidos de sus clientes, necesita de un préstamo para comprar una máquina plana.
texts.en:
After learning the trade of sewing following the death of her husband and being left with three children, Rosa Idalides found it necessary to begin working from home. She makes clothes for third parties in order to generate income, subsist and improve her and her family's quality of life. Since then, due to her tenacity and effort, this enterprising woman was able to make her workshop thanks to the savings she acquired with her work and her two jobs. This fills her with satisfaction.  
 
As a great visionary, Rosa hopes to keep growing her business to position herself in the market and become a great generator of employment. For this, and in order to acquire working capital to fill her customer's order, she needs a loan to buy a sewing machine.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine to facilitate the sewing process.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise to improve her sales of catalogue products.

loans.name: Bertha

texts.es: Bertha, de 45 años, es una mujer inteligente y trabajadora, esta casada con Juan, de 46 años. Ambos tienen 8 hijos, pero solo viven con 2 de ellos, Sandro de 12 y Lisandra de 9 años, en su casa propia ubicada en la selva central (comunidad nativa Centro Pumpuriani). Con la sonrisa que la caracteriza, ella siempre aprendió a salir adelante; hace 25 años que se dedica a la siembra de café, maíz híbrido (llamados polenta), plátanos, palta y yuca; en todo este tiempo logró adquirir 9 terrenos de cultivo. Ella siembra en grandes cantidades y por temporadas; en el mes de setiembre sembrará maíz y yuca, en mes de diciembre café y en verano cítricos; es así que ya tiene planeado sus próximos cultivos; los cuales depende del tiempo de mayor demanda de los productos en el mercado. Lo que más le gusta es sembrar, cuidar su cultivo y venderlo a los comerciantes que llegan cada fin de semana a su comunidad nativa. Más se siente algo inestable, ya que hace algunos meses se quemó sus plantaciones de plátanos, perdiendo todo sus sembríos, pero no la desanima; al contrario busca la manera de salir adelante; pues sembró nuevos plantitas de plátanos con los que espera obtener un buen fruto nuevo. Por ahora prioriza juntar el capital necesario para poder construir su casa con un material más resistente y con ello darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Abejitas de Pumpuriani” y este es el quinto crédito con MFP, donde está contenta de saber que tendrá el apoyo financiero para lograr sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete una vez más a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Bertha de obtener su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios sacos de abono orgánico para esparcirlos entre sus cultivos de plátanos, yuca y maíz que muy pronto cosechará. Asimismo dará el primer paso en el mejoramiento de su casita con la compra de materiales como ladrillos y calaminas.
texts.en:
Bertha, 45, is an intelligent and hardworking woman. She is married to Juan, 46, and they have 8 children, although only 2 of them live with their parents: Sandro, aged 12, and Lisandra, aged 9. They live in their own home, located in the central forest in the native community of Centro Pumpuriani. With her characteristic smile, she has always managed to get ahead. For 25 years she has sold coffee, corn (polenta), bananas, avocados and cassava, and over time she has managed to buy 9 plots of land. She sows in large quantities and depending on the season. She will sow corn and cassava in September, coffee in December and citrus fruits in the Summer. She has already planned her next crops, which will depend on the seasonality of the product demand in the marketplace. 

What she enjoys the most is sowing, tending to her crops and selling them to the traders that arrive every week-end to her native community. Her current situation is slightly unstable, as a few months ago her banana plants caught fire and she lost the whole crop, but she does not let this discourage her. On the contrary, she is looking at other ways of getting ahead, and she has already sown young banana plants which she hopes will give good fruits.
